Zuke wants to go explore it with Tinzy.

fields.name: Dragonborn Fury
fields.description: When you’re bloodied, you gain a +1 racial bonus to attack rolls.

fields.name: Draconic Heritage
fields.description: Your healing surge value is equal to one-quarter of your maximum hit points + your Constitution modifier.

fields.name: Dragon Breath
fields.description: You can use _dragon breath_ as an encounter power.

fields.name: Cast-Iron Stomach
fields.description: +5 racial bonus to saving throws against poison.

fields.name: Dwarven Resilience
fields.description: You can use your second wind as a minor action instead of a standard action.

fields.name: Weapon Proficiency
fields.description: You gain proficiency with the throwing hammer and the warhammer.

fields.name: Encumbered Speed
fields.description: You move at your normal speed even when it would normally be reduced by armor or a heavy load. Other effects that limit speed (such as difficult terrain or magical effects) affect you normally.

fields.name: Stand Your Ground
fields.description:
When an effect forces you to move—through a pull, a push, or a slide—you can move 1 square less than the effect specifies. This means an effect that normally pulls, pushes, or slides a target 1 square does not force you to move unless you want to.

In addition, when an attack would knock you prone, you can immediately make a saving throw to avoid falling prone.

fields.name: Eladrin Education
fields.description: You gain training in one additional skill.

fields.name: Weapon Proficiency
fields.description: You gain proficiency with the longsword.

fields.name: Eladrin Will
fields.description:
You gain a +1 racial bonus to your Will defense.

In addition, you gain a +5 racial bonus to saving throws against charm effects.

fields.name: Fey Origin
fields.description: Your ancestors were native to the Feywild, so you are considered a fey creature for the purpose of effects that relate to creature origin.

fields.name: Trance
fields.description: Rather than sleep, eladrin enter a meditative state known as trance. You need to spend 4 hours in this state to gain the same benefits other races gain from taking a 6-hour extended rest. While in a trance, you are fully aware of your surroundings and notice approaching enemies and other events as normal.

fields.name: Fey Step
fields.description: You can use _fey step_ as an encounter power.

fields.name: Weapon Proficiency
fields.description: You gain proficiency with the longbow and the shortbow.

fields.name: Fey Origin
fields.description: Your ancestors were native to the Feywild, so you are considered a fey creature for the purpose of effects that relate to creature origin.

fields.name: Group Awareness
fields.description: You grant non-elf allies within 5 squares of you a +1 racial bonus to Perception checks.

fields.name: Wild Step
fields.description: You ignore difficult terrain when you shift (even if you have a power that allows you to shift multiple squares).

fields.name: Elven Accuracy
fields.description: You can use _elven accuracy_ as an encounter power.

fields.name: Dilettante
fields.description: At 1st level, you choose an at-will power from a class different from yours. You can use that power as an encounter power.

fields.name: Dual Heritage
fields.description: You can take feats that have either elf or human as a prerequisite (as well as those specifi- cally for half-elves), as long as you meet any other requirements.

fields.name: Group Diplomacy
fields.description: You grant allies within 10 squares of you a +1 racial bonus to Diplomacy checks.

fields.name: Bold
fields.description:
You gain a +5 racial bonus to saving throws
against fear.

fields.name: Nimble Reaction
fields.description: You gain a +2 racial bonus to AC against opportunity attacks.

fields.name: Second Chance
fields.description: You can use second chance as an encounter power.

fields.name: Bonus At-Will Power
fields.description: You know one extra at-will power from your class.

fields.name: Bonus Feat
fields.description: You gain a bonus feat at 1st level. You must meet the feat’s prerequisites.

fields.name: Bonus Skill
fields.description: You gain training in one additional skill from your class skill list.

fields.name: Defense Bonuses
fields.description: +1 to Fortitude, Reflex, and Will defenses.

fields.name: Bloodhunt
fields.description: You gain a +1 racial bonus to attack rolls against bloodied foes.

fields.name: Fire Resistance
fields.description: You have resist fire 5 + one-half your level.

fields.name: Infernal Wrath
fields.description: You can use _infernal wrath_ as an encounter power.

fields.name: Skill Bonus
fields.description: +2 to a skill of your choice.

fields.name: Telepathy
fields.description: You can communicate telepathically with any creature within 5 squares of you that has a language.

fields.name: Crystalline Mind
fields.description: You have resist 5 psychic. The resis­ tance increases to 10 at 11 th level and 15 at 21 st level.

fields.name: Living Construct
fields.description: You are a living construct. You don't need to eat, drink, breathe, or sleep. You never have to make Endurance checks to resist the effects of starvation, thirst, or suffocation.

fields.name: Immortal Origin
fields.description: You are native to the Astral Sea, so you are considered an immortal creature for the purpose of effects that relate to creature origin.

fields.name: Shard Swarm
fields.description: You have the shard swarm power.

fields.name: Construct
fields.description: You have the construct keyword, so you are considered to be a construct for effects that relate to that keyword.

fields.name: Living Construct
fields.description:
As a living construct, you have the following traits.

* You gain a +2 bonus to saving throws against ongoing damage.
* You can us attached components and embedded components made for warforged (see Equipment, page 32).
* You don’t need to eat, drink, or breathe, but this doesn’t render you immune to any effect.
* Rather than sleep, warforged spend 4 hours refraining from any strenuous activity. You need to spend 4 hours in this state to gain the same benefits other races gain from taking a 6-hour extended rest. While resting in this low-exertion state, you are fully aware of your surroundings and notice approaching enemies and other events as normal.
* When reduced to 0 hit points, you are less likely to die. When you make a death saving throw, you can take the better of your die roll or 10. You still die at the normal negative hit point total.

fields.name: Warforged Mind
fields.description: You gain a +1 racial bonus to your Will defense.

fields.name: Warforged Resolve
fields.description: You can use Warforged Resolve as an encounter power.

fields.name: Astral Majesty
fields.description: You have a +1 bonus to all defenses against attacks made by bloodied creatures.

fields.name: Astral Resistance
fields.description: You have resistance to necrotic damage and radiant damage equal to 5 + one-half your level.

fields.name: Immortal Origin
fields.description: Your spirit is native to the Astral Sea, so you are considered an immortal creature for the purposes of effects that relate to creature origin.

fields.name: Fey Origin
fields.description: Your ancestors were native to the Feywild, so you are considered a fey creature for the purpose of effects that relate to creature origin.

fields.name: Master Trickster
fields.description: Once per encounter, you can use the wizard cantrip ghost sound (_Player’s Handbook_, page 158) as a minor action.

fields.name: Reactive Stealth
fields.description: If you have any cover or concealment when you make an initiative check, you can make a Stealth check.

fields.name: Trickster’s Cunning
fields.description: You have a +5 racial bonus to saving throws against illusions.

fields.name: Mountain’s Tenacity
fields.description: You have a +1 racial bonus to Will.

fields.name: Powerful Athlete
fields.description: When you make an Athletics check to jump or climb, roll twice and use either result.

fields.name: Half-Orc Resilience
fields.description: The first time you are bloodied during an encounter, you gain 5 temporary hit points. The temporary hit points increase to 10 at 11th level and to 15 at 21st level.

fields.name: Swift Charge
fields.description: You gain a +2 bonus to speed when charging.

fields.name: Fey Origin
fields.description: Your ancestors were native to the Feywild, so you are considered a fey creature for the purpose of effects that relate to creature origin.

fields.name: Trance
fields.description: Rather than sleep, drow enter a meditative state known as trance. You need to spend 4 hours in this state to gain the same benefits other races gain from taking a 6-hour extended rest. While in a trance, you are fully aware of your surroundings and notice approaching enemies and other events as normal.

fields.name: Lolthtouched
fields.description: Once per encounter, you can use either the _cloud of darkness_ power or the _darkfire_ power.

fields.name: Elemental Origin
fields.description: Your ancestors were native to the Elemental Chaos, so you are considered an elemen- tal creature for the purpose of effects that relate to creature origin.

fields.name: Elemental Manifestation
fields.description:
Choose one elemental manifestation: earthsoul, firesoul, stormsoul, water- soul, or windsoul. That manifestation is part of your nature. (The Extra Manifestation feat, page 133, lets you add additional manifestations and change your manifestation.) Each elemental manifestation offers particular benefits and provides an associated encounter power. Your appearance changes based on the element you are manifesting.

_Earthsoul_: You gain a +1 racial bonus to your Fortitude defense, a +1 racial bonus to saving throws, and the _earthshock power_.

_Firesoul_: You gain a +1 racial bonus to your Reflex defense, resist 5 fire, and the _firepulse_ power.
At 11th level, the resistance improves to 10 fire. At 21st level, the resistance improves to 15 fire.

_Stormsoul_: You gain a +1 racial bonus to your Fortitude defense, resist 5 lightning, and the _promise of storm power_.
At 11th level, the resistance improves to 10 lightning.
At 21st level, the resistance improves to 15 lightning.

_Watersoul_: You can breathe underwater. You also gain a +2 racial bonus to saving throws against ongoing damage and the _swiftcurrent power_.

_Windsoul_: You gain resist 5 cold and the _windwalker power_.
At 11th level, the resistance improves to 10 cold. At 21st level, the resistance improves to 15 cold.

fields.name: Shapechanger
fields.description: You are a shapechanger; you can alter your appearance. As such, you are subject to effects and conditions that affect shapechangers.

fields.name: Mental Defense
fields.description: You have a +1 racial bonus to Will.

fields.name: Dual Soul
fields.description: At the start of your turn, you can make a saving throw against each effect currently rendering you dazed or dominated. If you fail the saving throw, you do not make a saving throw against the effect at the end of your turn.

fields.name: Defense Mobility
fields.benefit: You gain a +2 bonus to AC against opportunity attacks.

fields.name: Escape Artist
fields.benefit:
You can attempt to escape a grab as a minor action, instead of as a move action.

You gain a +2 feat bonus to Acrobatics checks.

fields.name: Jack of All Trades
fields.benefit: You gain a +2 feat bonus to all untrained skill checks.

fields.name: Lost in the Crowd
fields.benefit: You gain a +2 bonus to AC when you are adjacent to at least two enemies larger than you.

fields.name: Quick Draw
fields.benefit:
You can draw a weapon (or an object stored in a belt pouch, bandolier, or similar container, such as a potion) as part of the same action used to attack with the weapon or use the object.

You also gain a +2 feat bonus to initiative checks.

fields.name: Reckless Scramble
fields.benefit: When a power lets you shift, you can instead choose to move that distance + 2 squares.

fields.name: Cull the Weak
fields.benefit: When you have combat advantage against a bloodied or weakened target, you gain a +2 bonus to melee weapon damage rolls against the target.

fields.name: Defensive Advantage
fields.benefit: When you have combat advantage against an enemy, you gain a +2 bonus to AC against that enemy’s attacks.

fields.name: Point-Blank Shot
fields.benefit: If you make a ranged attack against a foe within 5 squares of you, your attack ignores cover and concealment, including superior cover but not total concealment.

fields.name: Rogue Weapon Mastery
fields.benefit:
When you wield a dagger or shuriken the weapon gains the high crit property.

**High Crit**: A high crit weapon deals more damage when you score a critical hit with it. A critical hit deals maximum weapon damage and an extra 1[W] at 1st–10th levels, an extra 2[W] at 11th–20th levels, and an extra 3[W] at 21st–30th levels. This extra damage is in addition to any critical damage the weapon supplies if it is a magic weapon.

fields.name: Implement Expertise (Staff)
fields.benefit:
Chosen Implement: **Staff**

Choose a type of implement. You gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls with any implement power you use through that type of implement. The bonus increases to +2 at 15th level and +3 at 25th level.
fields.special: You can take this feat more than once. Each time you take this feat, choose a different type of implement.

fields.name: Oncoming Storm
fields.benefit: When you hit with any lightning attack power, you gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls with thunder powers until the end of your next turn.

fields.name: Echoes of Thunder
fields.benefit: When you hit with any thunder attack power, you gain a +1 bonus to damage rolls until the end of your next turn. The bonus increases to +2 at 11th level and +3 at 21st level.

fields.name: Improved Dragon Soul
fields.benefit: The resistance granted by your Dragon Soul increases by 2. The increase changes to 5 at 11th level and 10 at 21st level.

fields.name: Raging Storm
fields.benefit:
You gain a +1 feat bonus to damage rolls when you use a power that has the lightning or thunder keyword.

At 11th level, this bonus increases to +2. At 21st level, it increases to +3.

fields.name: Skill Power
fields.benefit: You gain a skill power of your level or lower from a skill in which you are trained.

fields.name: Expanded Spellbook
fields.benefit:
Choose one daily wizard attack spell of every level you know. Add this spell to your spellbook.
Each time you gain a new level of daily wizard attack spells, you learn one extra spell of that level (in
other words, add three spells to your spellbook instead of only two).
This feat doesn't change the number of daily attack spells you can prepare each day.

fields.name: Linguist
fields.benefit: Learn three new languages. You can now speak, read, and write those languages fluently.
fields.special: You can take this feat more than once. Each time you select this feat, choose three new languages to learn.

fields.name: Arcane Reserves
fields.benefit: If all your arcane encounter attack powers are expended, you gain a +2 bonus to damage rolls with your arcane at-will attack powers until the end of the encounter or until you regain the use of one of your arcane encounter attack powers.

fields.name: Improved Tome of Readiness
fields.prerequisites: 11th level, Con 13, Wis 13, wizard, Tome of Readiness class feature
fields.benefit: After you prepare your daily and utility wizard powers after an extended rest, choose one daily or utility power in your spellbook that you didn't prepare and store this power in your tome.

fields.name: Paragon Defenses
fields.benefit: You gain a +1 feat bonus to Fortitude, Reflex and Will.

fields.name: Focused Wizardry
fields.benefit: When you use an arcane burst or blast attack power and only one creature is within the area of effect, you gain a +2 bonus to the attack roll.

fields.name: Trusted Spellcasting
fields.benefit: Choose one arcane encounter attack power that you know and that does not already deal damage on a miss. That power now deals half damage on a miss.

fields.name: Quickened Spellcasting
fields.benefit: Choose an arcane at-will attack power that is used as a standard action. Once per encounter, you can use that power as a minor action.

fields.name: Arcane Mastery
fields.benefit: Once per encounter, you can spend an action point to regain the use of a daily wizard power you've already used today, instead of taking an extra action.

fields.name: Spell Accuracy
fields.benefit: You can omit a number of squares from the area of effect of any of your area or close wizard powers. This number can't exceed your Wisdom modifier.

fields.name: Armored Swiftness Training
fields.benefit: You don't take an armor check penalty to your Dexterity-based skill checks.

fields.name: Skill Focus
fields.benefit: Choose a skill in which you have training. You have a +3 feat bonus to checks with that skill.
fields.special: You can take this feat more than once. Each time you select this feat, choose a different skill.

fields.name: Two-Weapon Defense
fields.benefit: While holding a melee weapon in each hand, you gain a +1 shield bonus to AC and Reflex.

fields.name: Two-Weapon Fighting
fields.benefit: While holding a melee weapon in each hand, you gain a +1 bonus to damage rolls with your main weapon.

fields.name: Weapon Focus
fields.benefit: Choose a specific weapon group, such as spears or heavy blades. You gain a +1 feat bonus to damage rolls with your chosen weapon group. At 11th level, this bonus increases to +2. At 21st level, it increases to +3.
fields.special: You can take this feat more than once. Each time you select this feat, choose another weapon group.

fields.name: Weapon Proficiency
fields.benefit: You gain proficiency in a single weapon of your choice.
fields.special: You can take this feat more than once. Each time you select this feat, choose another weapon.

fields.name: Avenging Spirit
fields.prerequisites: 11th level, human fighter or human warlord
fields.benefit: When an ally of your level or higher is reduced to 0 hit points or fewer, you gain an action point that you must use before the end of your next turn or the action point is lost. You must see or hear the ally when he or she is reduced to 0 hit points or fewer to gain this feat’s benefit.

fields.name: Daunting Challenge
fields.prerequisites: 11th level, fighter, Combat Challenge class feature
fields.benefit: Creatures marked by you take a –3 penalty to attack rolls for any attack that doesn’t include you as a target (rather than a –2 penalty).

fields.name: Reckless Attacker
fields.benefit: When you score a critical hit with a fighter attack power, you can make a melee basic attack as a free action. If you do so, you take a –2 penalty to AC until the end of your next turn.

fields.name: Deft Blade
fields.benefit: When you make a basic attack using a light blade,you can target AC or Reflex.

fields.name: Expansive Burst
fields.benefit: Your close burst and area burst attacks ignore cover, but not superior cover.

fields.name: Devastating Critical
fields.benefit: When you score a critical hit, you deal an extra 1d10 damage.

fields.name: Sieze the Moment
fields.benefit: During the first round of combat and during surprise rounds, you automatically gain combat advantage over a foe whose initiative result is lower than yours.

fields.name: Paragon Defenses
fields.benefit: You gain a +1 feat bonus to Fortitude, Reflex, and Will.

fields.name: Wizard Implement Expertise
fields.benefit: When you wield a wizard implement while using an arcane power, you can score a critical hit on a roll of 19-20.

fields.name: Mobile Warrior
fields.benefit: When you make an attack with a flail, a heavy blade, a light blade, or a spear, you can shift 1 square after resolving the attack, whether or not it hits.

fields.name: Rending Tempest
fields.benefit: When you hit a target with a melee attack using two weapons during your turn, your sub- sequent melee attacks against the target deal 1[W] extra damage on a hit during the same turn.

fields.name: Dual Challenge
fields.prerequisites: 21st level, fighter, Combat Challenge class feature
fields.benefit: Whenever you mark an enemy with Combat Challenge, you can mark one additional enemy adjacent to that enemy. This mark lasts until the end ofyour next turn.

fields.name: Devastating Critical
fields.benefit: When you score a critical hit, you deal an extra 1d10 damage.

fields.name: Improved Second Wind
fields.benefit: When you use your second wind, you heal an additional 5 hit points.

fields.name: Light Blade Precision
fields.benefit: You gain a +2 bonus to damage rolls with light blades against Large or larger targets.

fields.name: Two-Weapon Flurry
fields.benefit: While holding a melee weapon in each hand, if you make a successful opportunity attack with your primary weapon, you can also make an oppor- tunity attack with your off-hand weapon against the same target (but with a –5 penalty to the attack roll).

fields.name: Auspicious Lineage
fields.benefit: When you use your memory of a thousand lifetimes racial power, you add 1d8 to the triggering roll, instead of 1d6.

fields.name: Guaranteed Retribution
fields.benefit: When any enemy other than your oath of enmity target hits you, you gain a +1 feat bonus to attack rolls against your oath of enmity target until the end of your next turn.

fields.name: Implement Expertise
fields.benefit: Choose a type of implement. You gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls with any implement power you use through that type of implement. The bonus increases to +2 at 15th level and +3 at 25th level.
fields.special: You can take this feat more than once. Each time you take this feat, choose a different type of implement.

fields.name: Improved Armor of Faith
fields.benefit:
While you are neither wearing heavy armor nor using a shield, you gain a +1 bonus to AC.

The bonus increases to +2 at 11th level and +3 at 21st level.

fields.name: Potent Rebirth
fields.benefit: When you drop to 0 hit points or fewer, you gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls until the end of the encounter.

fields.name: Radiant Power
fields.benefit:
When you make an implement attack, you can take a –2 penalty to the attack roll. If you do so and the attack hits, it deals 2 extra radiant damage.

The extra radiant damage increases to 4 at 11th level and 6 at 21st level.

fields.name: Ascendant Lineage
fields.benefit: When you use your memory of a thousand lifetimes racial power and the triggering roll still fails, you don’t expend the use of memory of a thousand lifetimes. However, you can’t use the power again until the start of your next turn.

fields.name: Sorcerous Vision
fields.benefit: Whenever you would make a Perception check or an Insight check, you can make an Arcana check instead.

fields.name: Avandra's Gift
fields.benefit: When you use your _second change_ racial power and the enemy's attack misses, you gain combat advantage for the next attack roll you make against that enemy before the end of your next turn.

fields.name: Action Surge
fields.benefit: You gain a +3 bonus to attack rolls you make during any action you gained by spending an action point.

fields.name: Agile Hunter
fields.prerequisites: Dex 15, Ranger, Hunter's Quarry class feature
fields.benefit: When you score a critical hit with a melee attack against the target of your Hunter's Quarry, you can shift as a free action, and the enemy takes a -2 penalty on attack rolls against you until the end of your next turn.

fields.name: Armor of Bahamut
fields.prerequisites: Channel Divinity class feature, must worship Bahamut
fields.benefit: You can invoke the power of your deity to use _Armor of Bahamut_.

fields.name: Backstabber
fields.benefit: The extra damage dice from your Sneak Attack class feature increase from d6s to d8s.

fields.name: Dragonborn Frenzy
fields.benefit: While you are bloodied, you gain a +2 bonus to damage rolls.

fields.name: Durable
fields.benefit: Increase your number of healing surges by two.

fields.name: Elven Precision
fields.benefit: When you use the _elven accuracy_ power, you gain a +2 bonus to the new attack roll.

fields.name: Far Shot
fields.benefit: When you use a projectile weapon such as a bow or a crossbow, increase both the normal range and the long range by 5 squares.

fields.name: Halfling Agility
fields.benefit: When you use your halfling _second chance_ ability, the attacker takes a -2 penalty to the new attack roll.

fields.name: Healing Hands
fields.benefit: When you use the _lay on hands_ power, the affected ally regains additional hit points equal to your Charisma modifier.

fields.name: Human Perseverance
fields.benefit: You gain a +1 feat bonus to saving throws.

fields.name: Improved Misty Step
fields.benefit: Your Misty Step now allows you to teleport an additional 2 squares.

fields.name: Lethal Hunter
fields.benefit: The extra damage dice from your Hunter's Quarry class feature increase from d6s to d8s.

fields.name: Light Step
fields.benefit:
For the purpose of hourly or daily travel rates, add 1 to your overland speed and the speed of all allies in your traveling group.
Add 5 to the DC required to find of follow your tracks. If traveling with allies, you can share this benefit with up to five other characters.
You gain a +1 feat bonus to Acrobatics checks and Stealth checks.

fields.name: Power Attack
fields.benefit:
When making a melee attack, you can take a -2 penalty to the attack roll. If the attack hits, you gain a +2 bonus to the damage roll (or a +3 bonus to the damage roll with a two-handed weapon).

This extra damage increases by level, as shown on the table below, but the attack penalty remains the same:

1st-10th - +2 (+3 two-handed)
11th-20th - +4 (+6 two-handed)
21st-30th - +6 (9 two-handed)

fields.name: Moradin's Resolve
fields.prerequisites: Channel Divinity class feature, must worship Moradin
fields.benefit: You can invoke the power of your deity to use _Moradin's resolve_.

fields.name: Press the Advantage
fields.benefit: If you score a critical hit while you have combat advantage, you gain combat advantage against the target until the end of your next turn.

fields.name: Ritual Caster
fields.benefit: You can master and perform rituals of your level or lower. See Chapter 10 for information on acquiring, mastering, and performing rituals. Even though some rituals use the Heal skill or the Nature skill, the Arcana skill or the Religion skill is required to understand how to perform rituals.

fields.name: Advantage of Cunning
fields.prerequisites: Bard, Virtue of Cunning class feature
fields.benefit: When you slide an ally with your Virtue of Cunning, you can also slide an enemy that was adjacent to that ally into the space the ally vacated.

fields.name: Combat Medic
fields.benefit:
You administer first aid to stabilize the dying as a minor action, instead of a standard action.
You also gain a +2 feat bonus to Heal checks.

fields.name: Anger Unleashed
fields.benefit: The first time you are bloodied during an encounter, you gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

fields.name: Bardic Knowledge
fields.benefit: You gain a +2 feat bonus to Arcana, Dungeoneering, History, Nature, Religion, and Streetwise checks.

fields.name: Deadly Rage
fields.benefit: You gain a +1 bonus to damage rolls while raging. The bonus increases to +2 at 11th level and +3 at 21st level.

fields.name: Fey Trickster
fields.benefit: You gain the wizard cantrips _mage hand_ and _prestidigitation_ as encounter powers.

fields.name: Improved Majestic Word
fields.benefit: When you use _majestic word_, the target of the power gains temporary hit points equal to your Charisma modifier.

fields.name: Improved Rageblood Vigor
fields.benefit: You gain 5 additional temporary hit points from your Rageblood Vigor.

fields.name: Rising Fury
fields.benefit: When you reduce an enemy to 0 hit points, you gain a +2 feat bonus to weapon damage rolls until the end of your next turn. The bonus increases to +3 at 11th level and +4 at 21st level.

fields.name: Powerful Charge
fields.benefit: When you charge, you gain a +2 bonus to damage and a +2 bonus to bull rush attempts.

fields.name: Martial Alacrity
fields.benefit: You gain a +2 feat bonus to initiative checks. Also, during your first turn in an encounter, you can shift as a minor action.

fields.name: Marked Fury
fields.benefit: If an adjacent enemy that is marked by you makes an attack that doesn't include you as a target, it takes a penalty to the attack roll equal to either -2 or the number of enemies adjacent to you, whichever is worse. This penalty replaces the normal penalty for having a creature marked.

fields.name: Cursed Advantage
fields.prerequisites: Drow, warlock, Warlock's Curse class feature
fields.benefit: You gain combat advantage against bloodied enemies cursed by you.

fields.name: Destructive Wizardry
fields.benefit:
When you use an arcane attack power and hit two or more creatures, you gain a +2 bonus to that power's damage rolls.
This bonus increases to +3 at 11th level and to +4 at 21st level.

fields.name: Dooming Action
fields.benefit: When you spend an action point to take an extra action and you have already dealt your Warlock's Curse extra damage during your current turn, you can deal the extra damage a second time during this turn.

fields.name: Empowering Shadows
fields.benefit: When you have concealment from your Shadow Walk, you gain a +1 bonus to damage rolls.

fields.name: Twist the Arcane Fabric
fields.benefit: Before you use an area or close arcane power, you can use a free action to expend your _fey step_ racial power to teleport an ally rather than yourself. If you do so, select one ally within the area of effect targeted by the arcane power and teleport that ally 3 sqaures.

fields.name: Versatile Expertise
fields.benefit: Choose a weapon group and an implement type. You gain a +1 feat bonus to attack rolls both when using a weapon from the chosen group and when using an implement of the chosen type. The bonus increases to +2 at 15th level and +3 at 25th level.
fields.special: You can take this feat more than once. Each time you take this feat, choose a different weapon group and a different implement type.

fields.name: Tempest Magic
fields.prerequisites: Sorcerer, Con 13, Dex 13, Storm Magic class feature
fields.benefit:
When you use an arcane power that has the lightning or thunder keyword, you gain a +1 feat bonus to damage rolls. While you are bloodied, this bonus becomes +2.

At 11th level, this bonus increases to +2 (or +4 when bloodied). At 21st level, it increases to +3 (or +6 when bloodied).

fields.name: Arcane Reserves
fields.benefit: Ifall your arcane encounter attack powers are expended, you gain a +2 bonus to damage rolls with your arcane at-will attack powers until the end ofthe encounter or until you regain the use of one ofyour arcane encounter attack powers.

fields.name: Arcane Admixture
fields.benefit:
Choose one arcane power that you know and choose acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder. The power now deals that damage type in addition to its normal damage type and gains that keyword.

Each time you gain a level, you can choose to reassign either the power to which this feat's effect applies or the additional damage type applied (or both).
fields.special: You can take this feat more than once. Each time you select this feat, choose a different power. You can't apply this feat to the same power more than once.

fields.name: Toughness
fields.benefit: When you take this feat, you gain additional hit points. You gain an additional 5 hit points at each tier of play (at 1st, 11th, and 21st level).

fields.flavor: Your fists become a blur as you follow up your initial attack with another, shifting your foes' positions to your advantage.
fields.special:
You can use this power only once per round.

_Level 11: You may target one or two creatures._

_Level 21: You may target each enemy adjacent to you._
fields.trigger: You hit with an attack during your turn
fields.name: Centered Flurry of Blows
fields.effect: The target takes damage equal to 2 + your Wisdom modifier, and you slide it 1 square to a square adjacent to you or 1 square in any direction if the target wasn't targeted by the triggering attack.

fields.flavor: You move like a whirlwind, spinning as you unleash an array of kicks and punches, which slam into your foes like a storm crashing onto the shore.
fields.special:
**Movement Technique**

**Move Action**, **Personal**

**Effect:** You shift 2 squares.
fields.hit:
1d8 + Dexterity modifier damage.

_Level 21_: 2d8 + Dexterity modifier damage.
fields.target: Each enemy in burst you can see
fields.name: Stone Fist Flurry of Blows

fields.flavor: You boldly confront a nearby enemy, searing it with divine light if it ignores your challenge.
fields.special: Even though this ability is called a challenge, it doesn’t rely on the intelligence or language ability of the target. It’s a magical compulsion that affects the creature’s behavior, regardless of the creature’s nature. You can’t place a divine challenge on a creature that is already affected by your or another character’s divine challenge.
fields.name: Divine Challenge
fields.effect:
You mark the target. The target remains marked until you use this power against another target, or if you fail to engage the target (see below). A creature can be subject to only one mark at a time. A new mark supersedes a mark that was already in place.

While a target is marked, it takes a –2 penalty to attack rolls for any attack that doesn’t include you as a target. Also, it takes radiant damage equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier the first time it makes an attack that doesn’t in- clude you as a target before the start of your next turn. The damage increases to 6 + your Charisma modifier at 11th level, and to 9 + your Charisma modifier at 21st level.

On your turn, you must engage the target you chal- lenged or challenge a different target. To engage the target, you must either attack it or end your turn adjacent to it. If none of these events occur by the end of your turn, the marked condition ends and you can’t use divine chal- lenge on your next turn.
You can use divine challenge once per turn.

fields.flavor: Your divine touch instantly heals wounds.
fields.special: You can use this power a number of times per day equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum 1), but only once per round.
fields.name: Lay on Hands
fields.effect: You spend a healing surge but regain no hit points. Instead, the target regains hit points as if it had spent a healing surge. You must have at least one healing surge remaining to use this power.

fields.flavor: With a wave of your hand, you cause a bright light to appear on the tip of your staff, upon some other object, or in a nearby space.
fields.special: You can have only one light cantrip active at a time. If you create a new light, your previously cast light winks out.
fields.name: Light
fields.effect: You cause the target to shed bright light. The light fills the target’s square and all squares within 4 squares of it. The light lasts for 5 minutes. Putting out the light is a free action.

fields.flavor: You gesture toward an object nearby, and a spectral floating hand lifts the object into the air and moves it where you wish.
fields.special: You can create only one hand at a time.
fields.sustain_text: You can sustain the hand indefinitely.
fields.name: Mage Hand
fields.effect:
You conjure a spectral, floating hand in an unoccupied square within range. The hand picks up, moves, or manipulates an adjacent object weighing 20 pounds or less and carries it up to 5 squares. If you are holding the object when you use this power, the hand can move the object into a pack, a pouch, a sheath, or a similar container and simultaneously move any one object carried or worn anywhere on your body into your hand.
As a move action, you can move the hand up to 5 squares. As a free action, you can cause the hand to drop an object it is holding, and as a minor action, you can cause the hand to pick up or manipulate a different object.

fields.flavor: With a wink, you create an illusory sound that emanates from somewhere close by.
fields.name: Ghost Sound
fields.effect: You cause a sound as quiet as a whisper or as loud as a yelling or fighting creature to emanate from the target. You can produce nonvocal sounds such as the ringing of a sword blow, jingling armor, or scraping stone. If you whisper, you can whisper quietly enough that only creatures adjacent to the target can hear your words.

fields.flavor: You perform an amusing magical trick, such as creating a dancing wisp of light, freshening a wilting flower, making a coin invisible, or warming a cold drink.
fields.special: You can have as many as three prestidigitation effects active at one time.
fields.name: Prestidigitation
fields.effect:
Use this cantrip to accomplish one of the effects given below.
✦ Move up to 1 pound of material.
✦ Create a harmless sensory effect, such as a shower of sparks, a puff of wind, faint music, or a strong odor.
✦ Color, clean, or soil items in 1 cubic foot for up to 1 hour.
✦ Instantly light (or snuff out) a candle, a torch, or a small campfire.
✦ Chill, warm, or flavor up to 1 pound of nonliving material for up to 1 hour.
✦ Make a small mark or symbol appear on a surface for up to 1 hour.
✦ Produce out of nothingness a small item or image that exists until the end of your next turn.
✦ Make a small, handheld item invisible until the end of your next turn.
Nothing you create with this cantrip can deal damage, serve as a weapon or a tool, or hinder another creature’s actions. This cantrip cannot duplicate the effect of any other power.

fields.flavor: You alter your form to look like another person.
fields.name: Changeling Disguise
fields.effect:
You alter your physical form to take on the appearance of any Medium humanoid. You retain your statistics in your new form, and your clothing, armor, and possessions do not change. The new form lasts until you change form again.

Any creature that attempts to see through your ruse makes an Insight check opposed by your Bluff check, and you gain a +5 bonus to your check.

fields.flavor: A brilliant ray of light sears your foe with golden radiance. Sparkles of light linger around the target, guiding your ally’s attack.
fields.hit:
1d8 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage, and one ally you can see gains a +2 power bonus to his or her next attack roll against the target.

Increase damage to 2d8 + Wisdom modifier at 21st level.
fields.name: Lance of Faith

fields.flavor: You utter a minor defensive prayer as you attack with your weapon.
fields.hit:
1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you and one adjacent ally gain a +1 power bonus to AC until the end of your next turn.

Increase damage to 2[W] + Strength modifier at 21st level.
fields.name: Priest's Shield

fields.flavor: You smite your foe with your weapon and brand it with a ghostly, glowing symbol of your deity's anger. By naming one of your allies when the symbol appears, you add divine power to that ally's attacks against the branded foe.
fields.hit:
1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and one ally within 5 squares of you gains a power bonus to melee attack rolls against the target equal to your Strength modifier until the end of your next turn.

Increase damage to 2[W] + Strength modifier at 21st level.
fields.name: Righteous Brand

fields.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
fields.flavor: A final lunge brings you into an advantageous position.
fields.special: You can move 2 squares before the attack.
fields.hit:
1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage.

Increase damage to 2[W] + Dexterity modifier at 21st level.
fields.name: Deft Strike

fields.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
fields.flavor: A needle-sharp point slips past armor and into tender flesh.
fields.hit:
1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage.

Increase damage to 2[W] + Dexterity modifier at 21st level.
fields.name: Piercing Strike

fields.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
fields.flavor: With a calculated strike, you leave your foe vulnerable to an adroit riposte should he dare attack you.
fields.hit:
1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage. If the target attacks you before the start of your next turn, you make your riposte against the target as an immediate interrupt: a Strength vs. AC attack that deals 1[W] + Strength modifier damage.

Increase damage to 2[W] + Dexterity modifier and riposte to 2[W] + Strength modifier at 21st level.
fields.name: Riposte Strike

fields.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
fields.flavor: A distracting flourish causes the enemy to forget the blade at his throat.
fields.hit:
1[W] + Dexterity modifier + Charisma modifier damage.

Increase damage to 2[W] + Dexterity modifier + Charisma modifier at 21st level.
fields.name: Sly Flourish

fields.flavor: You hurl a globe of acid at a distant enemy.
fields.special: This power can be used as a ranged basic attack.
fields.hit:
1d10 + Charisma modifier acid damage.

Level 21: 2d10 + Charisma modifier acid damage.
fields.name: Acid Orb

fields.flavor: You fling your arm in a wide arc, casting liquid fire at your foes.
fields.special: **Dragon Magic**: The next enemy that hits you with a melee attack before the end of your next turn takes fire damage equal to your Strength modifier.
fields.hit:
1d8 + Charisma modifier fire damage.

Level 21: 2d8 + Charisma modifier fire damage.
fields.name: Burning Spray

fields.flavor: A bolt of many-colored light leaps from your hand and screams toward an enemy’s head.
fields.sec_target: One creature within 5 squares of the target last hit by this power
fields.hit:
1d10 + Charisma modifier psychic damage.

**Secondary Attack**: Charisma vs. Will

**Hit**: 1d6 psychic damage. If you rolled an even number for the secondary attack roll, repeat the secondary attack. You can attack a creature only once with a single use of this power.
fields.name: Chaos Bolt
fields.effect:
**Wild Magic**: If you rolled an even number for the
primary attack roll, make a secondary attack.

fields.flavor: The thunder of your steps batters your foe.
fields.hit:
1d8 + Charisma modifier damage.

_Level 21_:  2d8 + Charisma modifier damage.
fields.name: Storm Walk
fields.effect: Before or after you attack, shift 1 square.

fields.flavor: You fire a bolt of dark, crackling eldritch energy at your foe.
fields.special:
At 1st level. you determine whether you use Charisma or Constitution to attack with this power. Once you make that choice, you can’t change it later.

This power counts as a ranged basic attack. When a power allows you to make a ranged basic attack, you can use this power.
fields.hit:
1d10 + Charisma or Constitution modifier damage.

Increase damage to 2d10 + Charisma or Constitution modifier at 21st level.
fields.name: Eldritch Blast

fields.flavor: You glare at your enemy, and your eyes briefly gleam with brilliant colors. Your foe reels under your mental assault, and you vanish from his sight.
fields.hit:
1d6 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and you are invisible to the target until the start of your next turn.

Increase damage to 2d6 + Charisma modifier at 21st level.
fields.name: Eyebite

fields.flavor: You point your finger, and your foe is scoured in hellish flames stoked by your own anger and pain. If you are injured, the flames burst into life one more time before they fade away.
fields.hit:
1d6 + Constitution modifier fire damage. If you take damage before the end of your next turn, the target takes an extra 1d6 + Constitution modifier fire damage.

Increase damage and extra damage to 2d6 + Constitution modifier at 21st level.
fields.name: Hellish Rebuke

fields.flavor: You cause a shaft of brilliant, cold starlight to lance down from above, bathing your foe in excruciating light. The nearer he moves toward you, the brighter and more deadly the light becomes.
fields.hit:
1d6 + Constitution modifier radiant damage. If the target moves nearer to you on its next turn, it takes an extra
1d6 + Constitution modifier damage.

Increase damage and extra damage to 2d6 + Constitution modifier at 21st level.
fields.name: Dire Radiance

fields.flavor: You launch a silvery bolt of force at an enemy.
fields.special: This power counts as a ranged basic attack. When a power allows you to make a ranged basic attack, you can use this power.
fields.hit:
2d4 + Intelligence modifier force damage.
Increase damage to 4d4 + Intelligence modifier at 21st level.
fields.name: Magic Missile

fields.flavor: A vertical column of golden flames burns all within.
fields.hit:
1d6 + Intelligence modifier fire damage.
Increase damage to 2d6 + Intelligence modifier at 21st level.
fields.name: Scorching Burst

fields.flavor: You hit one enemy, then cleave into another.
fields.hit:
1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and an enemy adjacent to you takes damage equal to your Strength modifier.

Increase damage to 2[W] + Strength modifier at 21st level.
fields.name: Cleave

fields.flavor: You punctuate your scything attacks with wicked jabs and small cutting blows that slip through your enemy’s defenses.
fields.miss: Half Strength modifier damage. If you’re wielding a two-handed weapon, you deal damage equal to your Strength modifier.
fields.hit:
1[W] + Strength modifier damage.
Increase damage to 2[W] + Strength modifier at 21st level.
fields.name: Reaping Strike

fields.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
fields.flavor: You lash out quickly and follow up faster, delivering two small wounds.
fields.attack: Strength vs. AC (main weapon and off-hand weapon), two attacks
fields.hit:
1[W] damage per attack.
Increase damage to 2[W] per attack at 21st level.
fields.name: Dual Strike

fields.flavor: Calling on the power of your deity, you transfer the pain of your wounds to a foe and regain some resilience.
fields.hit:
1d8 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage, and you gain temporary hit points equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Level 21: 2d8 + Wisdom modifier damage.
fields.name: Radiant Vengeance

fields.flavor: You show an ally how to hit your foe where it hurts.
fields.special: When you use this power, one ally within 5 squares of you gains a +1 bonus to the next attack roll they make before the start of your next turn.
fields.hit: 1[W] + Wisdom modifier damage. One ally adjacent to you or the target gains a bonus to his or her next damage roll equal to your Intelligence modifier.
fields.name: Leading Strike

fields.flavor: Lightning strikes your foe and then ricochets to another enemy.
fields.hit:
1d8 + Charisma modifier lightning damage. A creature of your choice other than the target and within 10 squares of the target takes lightning damage equal to your Dexterity modifier.

_Level 21_: 2d8+Charisma modifier lightning damage.

**Storm Magic**: You can apply your Storm Power bonus either to the damage roll against the target or to the damage taken by the enemy within 10 squares of the target.
fields.name: Lightning Strike

fields.flavor: Sacred light shines from above, searing a single enemy with its radiance while at the same time aiding an ally with its beneficent power.
fields.hit: 1d6 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage, and one ally you can see chooses either to gain temporary hit points equal to your Charisma modifier + one-half your level, or to make a saving throw.
fields.name: Sacred Flame

fields.flavor: You trade power for precision.
fields.hit:
1[W] damage.

Increase damage to 2[W] at 21st level.
fields.name: Sure Strike

fields.requirement: You must be using a shield.
fields.flavor: After each mighty swing, you bring your shield to bear and use it to push your enemy back.
fields.hit:
1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you push the target 1 square if it is your size, smaller than you, or one size category larger. You can shift into the space that the target occupied.

Increase damage to 2[W] + Strength modifier at 21st level.
fields.name: Tide of Iron

fields.flavor: You attack your foe without mercy or reprieve, and your accuracy is rewarded with a divine gift of vigor.
fields.hit:
1[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and you gain temporary hit points equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Increase damage to 2[W] + Charisma modifier at 21st level.
fields.name: Bolstering Strike

fields.flavor: You strike an enemy with your weapon, which ignites with holy light.
fields.hit:
1[W] + Strength modifier radiant damage. If you marked the target, you gain a bonus to the damage roll equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Increase damage to 2[W] + Strength modifier at 21st level.
fields.name: Holy Strike

fields.requirement: You must be wielding to melee weapons or a ranged weapon.
fields.flavor: You study the enemy, looking for a gap in his defenses. Only when you find it do you strike.
fields.attack: Strength +2 vs. AC (melee) or Dexterity + 2 vs. AC (ranged).
fields.hit:
1[W] damage (melee) or 1[W] damage (ranged).

Increase damage to 2[W] damage (melee) or 2[W] damage (ranged) at 21st level.
fields.name: Careful Attack

fields.flavor: You slink past your enemy's guard to make your attack, or you make your attack and then withdraw to a more advantageous position.
fields.special: Shift 1 square before or after you attack.
fields.hit:
1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage.

Increase damage to 2[W] + Dexterity modifier at 21st level.
fields.name: Nimble Strike

fields.flavor: You create a small cloud of whirling daggers of force that relentlessly attack creatures in the area.
fields.hit:
1d6 + Intelligence modifier force damage.

Increase damage to 2d6 + Intelligence modifier at 21st level.
fields.name: Cloud of Daggers
fields.effect: The power's area is filled with sharp daggers of force. Any creature that enters the area or starts it turn there takes force damage equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum 1). The cloud remains in place until the end of your next turn. You can dispel it earlier as a minor action.

fields.flavor: You create a whip-crack of sonic power that lashes up from the ground.
fields.hit:
1d6 + Intelligence modifier thunder damage, and you push the target a number of squares equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Increase damage to 2d6 + Intelligence modifier at 21st level.
fields.name: Thunderwave

fields.flavor: You conceal your arcane attack, tricking your foe into thinking the attack came from one of your allies.
fields.hit:
1d8 + Charisma modifier damage, and the target is marked by an ally within 5 squares of you until the end of your next turn.

Level 21: 2d8 + Charisma modifier damage.
fields.name: Misdirected Mark

fields.flavor: You unleash a string of insults at your foe, weaving them with bardic magic to send the creature into a blind rage.
fields.hit:
1d6 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

Level 21: 2d6 + Charisma modifier damage.
fields.name: Vicious Mockery

fields.requirement: You must be wielding a two-handed weapon.
fields.flavor: You strike with awesome power, more concerned with offensive strength than defensive posturing.
fields.hit:
1[W] + 1d8 + Strength modifier damage.
_Level 11:_ 1[W] + 2d8 + Strength modifier damage.
_Level21:_ 2[W] + 3d8 + Strength modifier damage.
fields.name: Devastating Strike
fields.effect: Until the start of your next turn, any attack gains a +2 bonus to attack rolls against you. If you are raging, attackers do not gain this bonus.

fields.requirement: You must be wielding a two-handed weapon.
fields.flavor: Nothing restores your will to fight more than slamming your weapon into a foe. Each swing gives you more will to press on.
fields.hit:
1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you gain temporary hit points equal to your Constitution modifier. If you are raging, the number of temporary hit points you gain equals 5 + your Constitution modifier.

_Level 11:_ 1[W] + 1d6 + Strength modifier damage.
_Level 21:_ 2[W] + 2d6 + Strength modifier damage.
fields.name: Recuperating Strike

fields.flavor: You are stealthy and fleet of foot at the same time.
fields.prerequisite: You must be trained in Stealth.
fields.name: Fleeting Ghost
fields.effect: You can move your speed and make a Stealth check. You do not take the normal penalty from movement on this check.

fields.flavor: You leap a great distance without a running start.
fields.prerequisite: You must be trained in Athletics.
fields.name: Great Leap
fields.effect: Make a high jump or a long jump. Determine the DC of the Athletics check as though you had a running start. The distance you jump can exceed your speed.

fields.flavor: You blend into your surroundings.
fields.trigger: You are hidden and lose cover or concealment against an opponent
fields.name: Chameleon
fields.effect: Make a Stealth check. Until the end of your next turn, you remain hidden if a creature that has a clear line of sight to you does not beat your check result with its Perception check. If at the end of your turn you do not have cover or concealment against a creature, that creature automatically notices you.

fields.flavor: You climb surfaces with astounding ease.
fields.prerequisite: You must be trained in Athletics.
fields.name: Nimble Climb
fields.effect: Make an Athletics check to climb a surface. You can move at your full speed during this climb.

fields.flavor: You silently step from shadow to shadow, slipping past your foes unseen and unheard.
fields.prerequisite: You must be trained in Stealth.
fields.name: Shadow Stride
fields.effect: You must be hiding to use this power. You can move your speed. At the end of that movement, if you have cover, you can make a Stealth check with no penalty for moving. If you make the Stealth check, you stay hidden during your movement.

fields.flavor: Your weapon attack lets you sink psychic fangs into your foe’s mind, crippling its ability to think and act.
fields.special:
**Augment 2**

**Hit:** 1[W] + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and the target is dazed and immobilized until the end of your next turn.
fields.hit: 1 [W] + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and the target is dazed and slowed until the end ofyour next turn.
fields.name: Insidious Distraction

fields.flavor: In the face of peril, you hold true to your faith and receive a special boon.
fields.name: Divine Fortune
fields.effect: You gain a +1 bonus to your next attack roll or saving throw before the end of your next turn.

fields.flavor: You steel yourselffor battle, 8irdin8 yourself a8ainst your foe's initial assault.
fields.special:
Until the end ofyour next turn, you gain resistance
to all damage equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.

* Level 11: Resist 6 + your Wisdom modifier.
* Level 21: Resist 9 + your Wisdom modifier.
fields.trigger:
An attack hits or misses you for the first time during
an encounter
fields.name: Battle Resilience

fields.flavor: You move in the blink o f an eye, reacllin8 your foes before they can draw their weapons.
fields.special: You can use this power even if you're surprised.
fields.trigger: You roll initiative
fields.name: Speed of Thought
fields.effect: You move a number of squares equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier.

fields.flavor: Your howl of victory shakes your enemies to the core, as they know your blood thirst is not yet quenched.
fields.trigger: Your attack reduces an enemy to 0 hit points
fields.name: Roar of Triumph
fields.effect: Each target takes a -2 penalty to all defenses until the end of your next turn.

fields.flavor: As your foe falls, you rush toward your next victim.
fields.trigger: Your attack reduces an enemy to 0 hit points
fields.name: Swift Charge
fields.effect: You charge an enemy.

fields.flavor: You lend your deity’s guidance to an ally’s attack against your foe.
fields.trigger: An ally within 10 squares of you makes an attack roll against your _oath of enmity_ target
fields.name: Divine Guidance
fields.effect: The target makes a second attack roll and uses either result.

fields.flavor: As you take a hit, your emotional energy inspires your allies.
fields.name: Ardent Alacrity
fields.effect: Each target can use a free action either to shift 1 square or to move half his or her speed.

fields.flavor: You whisper a brief prayer as divine light washes over your target, helping to mend its wounds.
fields.special: You can use this power twice per encounter, but only once per round. At 16th level, you can use this power three times per encounter.
fields.name: Healing Word
fields.effect:
The target can spend a healing surge and regain an additional 1d6 hit points.

Increase the amount of additional hit points regained to 2d6 at 6th level, 3d6 at 11th level, 4d6 at 16th level, 5d6 at 21st level, and 6d6 at 26th level.

fields.flavor: You send a surge of powerfol emotion that revives a falterine ally.
fields.special: You can use this power twice per encounter, but only once per round. At 16th level, you can use this power three times per encounter, but only once per round.
fields.name: Ardent Surge
fields.effect:
The target can spend a healing surge and regain 1d6 additional hit points.

_Level 6:_ 2d6 additional hit points.

_Level 11 :_ 3d6 additional hit points.

_Level 16:_ 4d6 additional hit points.

_Level 11:_ Sd6 additional hit points.

_Level 26:_ 6d6 additional hit points.

**Mantle of Clarity:** The target gains a + 1 bonus to all de­fenses until the end of your next turn. 

**Mantle of Elation:** The target gains a + 1 bonus to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

fields.flavor: Your unswerving faith in your deity empowers a nearby creature to resist a debilitating affliction.
fields.name: Channel Divinity: Divine Mettle
fields.effect: The target makes a saving throw with a bonus equal to your Charisma modifier.

fields.flavor: You petition your deity for the divine strength to lay low your enemies.
fields.name: Channel Divinity: Divine Strength
fields.effect: Apply your Strength modifier as extra damage on your next attack this turn.

fields.flavor: You call out to a wounded ally and offer inspiring words of cour- age and determination that helps that ally heal.
fields.special: You can use this power twice per encounter, but only once per round. At 16th level, you can use inspiring word three times per encounter.
fields.target: You or one ally in burst
fields.name: Inspiring Word
fields.effect:
The target can spend a healing surge and regain an additional 1d6 hit points.

The amount of additional hit points regained is 2d6 at 6th level, 3d6 at 11th level, 4d6 at 16th level, 5d6 at 21st level, and 6d6 at 26th level.

fields.flavor: You focus your wrath on a single foe, giving your attacks against it extraordinary accuracy.
fields.target: One enemy you can see in burst
fields.name: Oath of Enmity
fields.effect:
When you make a melee attack against the target and the target is the only enemy adjacent to you, you make two attack rolls and use either result. This effect lasts until the end of the encounter or until the target drops to 0 hit points, at which point you regain the use of this power.

If another effect lets you roll twice and use the higher result when making an attack roll, this power has no effect on that attack. If an effect forces you to roll twice and use the lower result when making an attack roll, this power has no effect on that attack either.

If an effect lets you reroll an attack roll and you rolled twice because of this power, you reroll both dice.

fields.flavor: You utter words laden with preternatural inspiration, restoring your ally's stamina and making wounds seem insignificant.
fields.special: You can use this power twice per encounter, but only once per round. At 16th level, you can use this power three times per encounter, but only once per round.
fields.target: You or one ally in burst
fields.name: Majestic Word
fields.effect:
The target can spend a healing surge and regain additional hit points equal to your Charisma modifier. You also slide the target one square.

_Level 6:_ 1d6 + Charisma modifier additional hit points.
_Level 11:_ 2d6 + Charisma modifier additional hit points.
_Level 16:_ 3d6 + Charisma modifier additional hit points.
_Level 21:_ 4d6 + Charisma modifier additional hit points.
_Level 26:_ 5d6 + Charisma modifier additional hit points.

fields.flavor: You infuse your words with arcane power, transforming even the simplest speech into compelling oratory.
fields.name: Words of Friendship
fields.effect: You gain a +5 power bonus to the next Diplomacy check you make before the end of your next turn.

fields.flavor: You sear undead foes, push them back, and root them in place.
fields.miss: Half damage, and the target is not pushed or immobilized.
fields.hit:
1d10 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage, and you push the target a number of squares equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier. The target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.

Increase damage to 2d10 + Wisdom modifier at 5th level, 3d10 + Wisdom modifier at 11th level, 4d10 + Wisdom modifier at 15th level, 5d10 + Wisdom modifier at 21st level, and 6d10 + Wisdom modifier at 25th level.
fields.name: Turn Undead

fields.flavor: You send a brilliant ray of radiant power at an undead foe,  compelling it to stagger toward you.
fields.miss: Half damage, and you pull the target 1 square.
fields.hit:
3d10 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage, and you pull the target a number of squares equal to 1 + your Wisdom modifier. The target is also immobilized until the end of your next turn.

* Level 5:  4d10 + Wisdom modifier damage.
* Level 11: 5d10 + Wisdom modifier damage.
* Level 15: 6d10 + Wisdom modifier damage.
* Level 21: 7d10 + Wisdom modifier damage.
* Level 25: 8d10 + Wisdom modifier damage.
fields.name: Abjure Undead

fields.flavor: With an instant of focus, you take careful aim at your foe and strike with the legendary accuracy of the elves.
fields.name: Elven Accuracy
fields.effect: Reroll an attack roll. Use the second roll, even if it’s lower.

fields.flavor: Your monstrous wrath burns inside you, giving strength to your attack.
fields.trigger: You hit an enemy
fields.name: Furious Assault
fields.effect: The attack deals 1[W] extra damage if it’s a weapon attack or 1d8 extra damage if it isn’t.

fields.flavor: Your monstrous wrath burns inside you, giving strength to your attack.
fields.trigger: You hit an enemy
fields.name: Furious Assault
fields.effect: The attack deals 1[W] extra damage if it's a weapon attack or 1d8 extra damage if it isn't.

fields.flavor: Luck and small size combine to work in your favor as you dodge your enemy’s attack.
fields.name: Second Chance
fields.effect: When an attack hits you, force an enemy to roll the attack again. The enemy uses the second roll, even if it’s lower.

fields.flavor: You erect a psychic shield to protect your mind from assault, and you ward your allies as well.
fields.trigger: An enemy hits or misses you with an attack against your Will
fields.target: You and each ally in burst
fields.name: Bastion of Mental Clarity
fields.effect: Each target gains a +4 power bonus to Will until the end of your next turn.

fields.flavor: With a step, you vanish from one place and appear in another.
fields.name: Fey Step
fields.effect: Teleport up to 5 squares (see “Teleportation,” PHB page 286).

fields.flavor: Your form ripples like water as you flow forward, whipping past enemies and rubble in a graceful but deadly surge.
fields.name: Swiftcurrent
fields.effect: You can shift up to your speed over ground or liquid terrain. You take no penalties for squeezing during this movement, can move through enemy spaces, ignore difficult terrain, and take no damage if the surface or substance you move across would ordinarily deal damage to you.

fields.flavor: You harness the power of the winds. Air swirls about you, lifting you from the earth.
fields.name: Windwalker
fields.effect: Fly 8 squares. If you don’t end your move on solid ground, you float to the ground without taking falling damage.

fields.flavor: The dreamlike memories of your previous lives lend insight to aid you.
fields.trigger: You make an attack roll, a saving throw, a skill check, or an ability check and dislike the result.
fields.name: Memory of a Thousand Lifetimes
fields.effect: You add 1d6 to the triggering roll.

fields.flavor: As you open your mouth with a roar, the deadly power of your draconic kin blasts forth to engulf your foes.
fields.special: When you create your character, choose Strength, Constitution, or Dexterity as the ability score you use when making attack rolls with this power. You also choose the power’s damage type: acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison. These two choices remain throughout your charac- ter’s life and do not change the power’s other effects.
fields.attack: Strength + 2 vs. Reflex, Constitution + 2 vs. Reflex, or Dexterity + 2 vs. Reflex
fields.hit:
1d6 + Constitution modifier damage.

Increase to +4 bonus and 2d6 + Constitution modifier damage at 11th level, and to +6 bonus and 3d6 + Constitution modifier damage at 21st level.
fields.name: Dragon Breath
fields.damage_type: Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Poison

fields.flavor: You call upon your furious nature to improve your odds of harming your foe.
fields.name: Infernal Wrath
fields.effect: You can channel your fury to gain a +1 power bonus to your next attack roll against an enemy that hit you since your last turn. If your attack hits and deals damage, add your Charisma modifier as extra damage.

fields.flavor: It’s difficult to take you down, even when you’re faltering.
fields.name: Warforged Resolve
fields.effect: You gain a number of temporary hit points equal to 3 + one-half your level. You may make an immediate saving throw against one effect that inflicts ongoing damage and can be ended with a save. In addition, if you are bloodied you regain hit points equal to 3 + one half your level.

fields.flavor: Your foes’ attacks bounce off your stony hide.
fields.name: Stone’s Endurance
fields.effect:
You gain resist 5 to all damage until the end of your next turn.

_Level 11_: Resist 10 to all damage.
_Level 21_: Resist 15 to all damage.

fields.requirement: You must be bloodied.
fields.flavor: You unleash the beast within and take on a savage countenance.
fields.name: Longtooth Shifting
fields.effect:
Until the end of the encounter, you gain a +2 bonus to damage rolls. In addition, while you are bloodied, you gain regeneration 2.

_Level 11_: Regeneration 4.
_Level 21_: Regeneration 6.

fields.requirement: You must be bloodied.
fields.flavor: You unleash the beast within and take on a savage countenance.
fields.name: Razorclaw Shifting
fields.effect: Until the end of the encounter, your speed increases by 2, and you gain a +1 bonus to AC and Reflex.

fields.flavor: A shroud of blackness descends around you, hiding you from sight.
fields.name: Cloud of Darkness
fields.effect: The burst creates a cloud of darkness that remains in place until the end of your next turn. The cloud blocks line of sight, squares within it are totally obscured, and creatures entirely within it are blinded until they exit. You are immune to these effects.

fields.flavor: A flickering halo of purple light surrounds the target, making it easier to hit.
fields.special: When you create your character, choose Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma as the ability score you use when making attack rolls with this power. This choice remains throughout your character’s life and does not change the power’s other effects.
fields.attack: ntelligence +4 vs. Reflex, Wisdom +4 vs. Reflex, or Charisma +4 vs. Reflex. Increase to +6 bonus at 11th level and +8 bonus at 21st level.
fields.hit: Until the end of your next turn, all attacks against the target have combat advantage, and the target cannot benefit from invisibility or concealment.
fields.name: Darkfire

fields.flavor: The earth moves in response to your stomping foot or slapping hand, buckling to knock your enemy to its knees.
fields.special: When you gain this manifestation, choose Strength, Constitution, or Dexterity as the ability score you use when making attack rolls with this power. This choice remains throughout your character’s life and does not change the power’s other effects.
fields.attack: Strength +2 vs. Fortitude, Constitution +2 vs. Fortitude, or Dexterity +2 vs. Fortitude. Increase to +4 bonus at 11th level, and to +6 bonus at 21st level.
fields.hit: The target is knocked prone.
fields.target: Enemies in burst that are touching the ground
fields.name: Earthshock

fields.flavor: The lightning living within you calls out to its companion, the thunder. Sparks dance across your skin, and the air around you seems to darken and rumble.
fields.name: Promise of Storm
fields.effect:
Until the end of your next turn, you deal an extra 1d8 damage with any lightning or thunder power you use.

At 11th level, increase your extra damage to 2d8. At 21st level, increase your extra damage to 3d8.

fields.flavor: Your feint tricks a foe into giving you an advantage.
fields.name: Changeling Trick
fields.effect: You make a Bluff check opposed by the target's passive Insight. If your check succeeds, you gain combat advantage against the target until the end of your next turn.

fields.flavor: You turn invisible in response to harm.
fields.name: Fade Away
fields.effect: You are invisible until you attack or until the end of your next turn.

fields.flavor: As an enemy lands a blow, retributive fire ignites from your arms and fists.
fields.special: When you gain this manifestation, choose Strength, Constitution, or Dexterity as the ability score you use when making attack rolls and damage rolls with this power. This choice remains throughout your character’s life and does not change the power’s other effects.
fields.attack: Strength +2 vs. Reflex, Constitution +2 vs. Reflex, or Dexterity +2 vs. Reflex. Increase to +4 bonus at 11th level, and to +6 bonus at 21st level.
fields.trigger: An enemy hits you with a melee attack
fields.hit:
1d6 + Strength, Constitution, or Dexterity modifier fire damage.

Increase to 2d6 + Strength, Constitution, or Dexterity modifier fire damage at 11th level, and to 3d6 + Strength, Constitution, or Dexterity modifier fire damage at 21st level.
fields.name: Firepulse

fields.flavor: You turn invisible in response to harm.
fields.trigger: You take damage
fields.name: Fade Away
fields.effect: You are invisible until you attack or until the end of your next turn.

fields.flavor: Bahamut protects you or a friend from devastating harm.
fields.special: You must take the Armor of Bahamut feat to use this power.
fields.trigger: An enemy scores a critical hit on you or an ally
fields.name: Channel Divinity: Armor of Bahamut
fields.effect: Turn a critical hit against you or an ally within range into a normal hit.

fields.flavor: Moradin's blessing puts the small on more equal footing with the large.
fields.special: You must take the Moradin's Resolve feat to use this power.
fields.name: Channel Divinity: Moradin's Resolve
fields.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls against Large or larger creatures.

fields.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
fields.flavor: An expert strike catches your foe by surprise and leaves him reeling from the pain.
fields.hit: 1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.
fields.name: Dazing Strike

fields.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
fields.flavor: It’s hard to get to the little guy when he takes cover behind an ally who can crush plate armor in his teeth.
fields.hit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage.
fields.name: King's Castle
fields.effect: Switch places with a willing adjacent ally.

fields.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
fields.flavor: A false stumble and a shove place the enemy exactly where you want him.
fields.hit:
1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you slide the target 1 square.

*Artful Dodger*: You slide the target a number of squares equal to your Charisma modifier.
fields.name: Positioning Strike

fields.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
fields.flavor: If you twist the blade in the wound just so, you can make your enemy howl in pain.
fields.hit:
2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage.

**Brutal Scoundrel**: You gain a bonus to the damage roll equal to your Strength modifier.
fields.name: Torturous Strike

fields.flavor: A shock wave of sound slams into the enemy.
fields.hit: 2d10 + Charisma modifier thunder damage, and you push the target 3 squares.
fields.name: Thunder Slam

fields.flavor: Your weapon sweeps in a deadly arc, leaving in its wake swirling radiant energy that keeps your foes at bay.
fields.special: Censure of Retribution: The radiant damage equals 5 + your Intelligence modifier.
fields.hit: 1[W] + Wisdom modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, any enemy that ends its turn adjacent to you or that hits or misses you takes 5 radiant damage.
fields.name: Avenging Echo

fields.flavor: Murmuring a prayer to your deity, you invoke a blast of white radiance from your holy symbol. Foes burn in its stern light, but your allies are heartened and guided by it.
fields.hit: 1d8 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage.
fields.name: Divine Glow
fields.effect: Allies in the blast gain a +2 power bonus to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

fields.flavor: You launch a dizzying barrage of thrusts at your enemy, compelling him to give you all his attention. Under the cover of your ferocious attack, one of your allies can safely retreat from that same foe.
fields.hit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and an ally adjacent to the target can shift 2 squares.
fields.name: Covering Attack

fields.flavor: Silvery spikes cover your weapon, punching through your foe's armor.
fields.hit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target and a number of enemies adjacent to you equal to your Wisdom modifier are marked until the end of your next turn.
fields.name: Piercing Smite

fields.flavor: You confound enemies by weaving through the battlefield unscathed as you make your attacks.
fields.attack: Strength +2 vs. AC (melee) or Dexterity + 2 vs. AC (ranged).
fields.hit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage (melee) or 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage (ranged).
fields.name: Evasive Strike

fields.flavor: From the mystic energy of the Feywild, you draw a brilliant white flame and set it in your enemy's mind and body. Rivulets of argent fire stream up into the air from his eyes, mouth, and hands; agony disrupts his very thoughts.
fields.hit:
2d6 + Charisma modifier fire damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

**Fey Pact:** The penalty to attack rolls is equal to 2 + your Intelligence modifier.
fields.name: Witchfire

fields.flavor: With frosty breath, you utter a single arcane word that creates a treacherous patch of ice on the ground, hampering your foes.
fields.hit: 1d6 + Intelligence modifier cold damage, and the target is knocked prone.
fields.name: Icy Terrain
fields.effect: The power's area is difficult terrain until the end of your next turn. You can end this effect as a minor action.

fields.flavor: You fog your foe's mind, causing it to stumble past your allies.
fields.hit:
1d6 + Charisma modifier damage, and you slide the target 2 squares. During the slide, you or one of your allies can make a melee basic attack against the target as a free action, with a +2 power bonus to the attack roll.

**Virtue of Cunning:** The power bonus to the attack roll equals 1 + your Intelligence modifier.
fields.name: Blunder

fields.flavor: You drop your guard and put all your strength into a devastating overhead swing.
fields.hit:
3[W] + Strength modifier damage.

**Rageblood Vigor:** The attack deals extra damage equal to your Constitution modifier.
fields.name: Avalanche Strike
fields.effect: Until the start of your next turn, any attacker gains a +4 bonus to attack rolls against you.

fields.flavor: You shift your body out of phase with the world for an instant, teleporting a short distance. When you reappear, you are still somewhat out of phase and difficult to harm or hinder for a short time.
fields.name: Ethereal Stride
fields.effect: You can teleport 3 squares, and you gain a +2 power bonus to all defenses until the end of your next turn.

fields.flavor: The line between truth and deception is thin, and you cross it with ease.
fields.trigger: You roll a Bluff check and dislike the result
fields.prerequisite: You must be trained in Bluff.
fields.name: Master of Deceit
fields.effect: Reroll the Bluff check. You decide whether to make the reroll before the DM announces the result.

fields.flavor: You throw up your hand, and a shield of arcane energy springs into existence, protecting you against imminent attacks.
fields.trigger: You are hit by an attack
fields.name: Shield
fields.effect: You gain a +4 bonus to AC and Reflex defense until the end of your next turn.

fields.flavor: You tumble out of harm’s way, dodging the opportunistic attacks of your enemies.
fields.prerequisite: You must be trained in Acrobatics.
fields.name: Tumble
fields.effect: You can shift a number of squares equal to one-half your speed.

fields.flavor: Having saved a bit of strength for just this moment, you burst across the battlefield.
fields.name: Combat Sprint
fields.effect: You move your speed +4. You gain a +4 bonus to all defenses against any opportunity attack you provoke with this movement.

fields.flavor: You spin around, releasing a blaze of golden energy. As you finish your revolution, you disappear and reappear a short distance away.
fields.name: Spatial Trip
fields.effect: You teleport a number of squares equal to half your speed.

fields.flavor: You can pilfer a coin pouch in the blink of an eye.
fields.prerequisite: You must be trained in Thievery.
fields.name: Quick Fingers
fields.effect: Make a Thievery check as part of this action, even if the check is normally a standard action.

fields.flavor: Even as your foe connects, you leap backward, out of the way of further harm.
fields.trigger: An enemy damages you with a melee attack
fields.name: Yield Ground
fields.effect: You can shift a number of squares equal to your Wisdom modifier. Gain a +2 power bonus to all defenses until the end of your next turn.

fields.flavor: You thwart an enemy's attack with a timely thrust of your blade or a quick shot from your bow.
fields.attack: Strength +2 vs. AC (melee) or Dexterity + 2 vs. AC (ranged).
fields.trigger: You or an ally is attacked by a creature
fields.hit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage (melee) or 1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage (ranged). The target takes a penalty to its attack roll for the triggering attack equal to 3 + Wisdom modifier.
fields.name: Disruptive Strike

fields.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
fields.flavor: You strike and weave, causing your foe to lurch forward so that you can duck around him and slip into his space.
fields.hit:
2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage. In addition, you switch places with the target and can then shift 1 square. 

**Artful Dodger**: You can shift a number of squares equal to your Charisma modifier.
fields.name: Bait and Switch

fields.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
