fields.flavor: You land a calculated blow that causes your enemy to drop his guard, leaving him vulnerable to subsequent attacks.
fields.hit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target grants combat advantage to you until the end of your next turn.
fields.name: Setup Strike

fields.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
fields.flavor: Balance and momentum are your allies as you lunge forward, strike deftly, and knock your opponent to the ground.
fields.special: Brutal Scoundrel: You gain a bonus to the attack roll equal to your Strength modifier.
fields.hit: 1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is knocked prone.
fields.name: Topple Over

fields.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
fields.flavor: You land an expert blow and follow up with a clever series of feints that bewilder your enemies.
fields.hit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage. Add your Charisma modifier to your AC until the start of your next turn.
fields.name: Trickster's Blade

fields.flavor: As lightning strikes your foe, thunder batters creatures around it.
fields.hit: 2d10 + Charisma modifier lightning damage, and each creature adjacent to the target takes thunder damage equal to your Charisma modifier.
fields.name: Dancing Lightning

fields.flavor: A circle of flame erupts around your foe, harming any other enemy that moves near the creature.
fields.special: Censure of Retribution: The fire damage equals 5 + your Intelligence modifier.
fields.hit: 2[W] + Wisdom modifier fire damage. Until the end of your next turn, any enemy that ends its turn adjacent to the target takes 5 fire damage.
fields.name: Halo of Fire

fields.flavor: A burning column of light engulfs your foe. Its brilliance burns and hinders your foe's defense for a short time.
fields.hit: 2d10 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage.
fields.name: Daunting Light
fields.effect: One ally you can see gains combat advantage against the target until the end of your next turn.

fields.flavor: Weaving your weapon in a graceful figure-eight, you lash out with a sudden attack.
fields.special: If you're wielding a polearm or a heavy blade, the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.
fields.hit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.
fields.name: Dance of Steel

fields.flavor: You swing your weapon in a wide arc that strikes not one but two creatures within your reach.
fields.attack: Strength vs. AC, one attack per target
fields.hit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is marked until the end of your next turn.
fields.name: Arcing Smite

fields.flavor: You fire purple rays of eldritch power at your foes.
fields.attack: Charisma vs. Reflex, one attack per target
fields.hit:
1d10 + Charisma modifier damage.

**Fey Pact:** Gain a bonus to each attack's damage roll equal to your Intelligence modifier.
fields.target: One creature, or two creatures no more than 5 squares apart from each other
fields.name: Eldritch Rain

fields.flavor: With a subtle gesture, you wreathe nearby enemies in flames.
fields.hit: 1d8 + Intelligence modifier fire damage, and ongoing 5 fire damage (save ends).
fields.name: Fire Shroud

fields.flavor: The mark of your weapon on your target's hide gives strength to your allies' attack against the same foe.
fields.hit:
1[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and each ally within 5 squares of you gains a +2 bonus to damage rolls against the target until the end of your next turn.

**Virtue of Cunning:** The bonus to damage rolls equals 1 + your Intelligence modifier.
fields.name: Cunning Ferocity

fields.flavor: Though the fury of your attack is directed at a single foe, no nearby enemy is spared your wrath.
fields.hit:
2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and each bloodied enemy adjacent to you takes damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

**Rageblood Vigor:** Each enemy adjacent to you that is not bloodied also takes damage equal to your Constitution modifier.
fields.name: Blade Sweep

fields.flavor: You cloud your mind with vague thoughts that shield you against a sudden mental attack.
fields.trigger: You are hit by an attack against your Will defense.
fields.prerequisite: You must be trained in Bluff.
fields.name: Slippery Mind
fields.effect: Gain a +2 power bonus to your Will defense against the triggering attack.

fields.flavor: As your foe unleashes its attack, you realize that you have read about this sort of danger and shout a warning to your friends.
fields.trigger: A creature you can see makes an attack roll for an area or a close attack that includes you as a target.
fields.name: Insightful Warning
fields.effect: You and each ally included as a target of the trigger­ing attack gain a +2 power bonus to all defenses against it.

fields.flavor: With a flourish of snapping sparks, your single step speeds you, lightning quick, across the battlefield.
fields.name: Lightning Shift
fields.effect: You shift your speed. You ignore difficult terrain during the shift.

fields.flavor: You step through the veils of the Feywild to the place where an ally stands and return to the world in that spot. Your ally is instantly whisked back to the place you started from.
fields.name: Fey Switch
fields.effect: You and your ally trade spaces.

fields.flavor: You steel yourself against a brutal attack.
fields.trigger: You are hit by an attack.
fields.name: Unbreakable
fields.effect: Reduce the damage from the attack by 5 + your Constitution modifier.

fields.flavor: With nimble ease, you sidestep one perilous situation after another.
fields.prerequisite: You must be trained in Acrobatics.
fields.name: Ignoble Escape
fields.effect: If you are marked, end that condition. You can shift a number of squares equal to your speed.

fields.flavor: When it comes to lying, cajoling, or persuading others, your allies follow your lead.
fields.prerequisite: You must be trained in Intimidate.
fields.target: You and each ally in burst
fields.name: Mob Mentality
fields.effect: The targets gain a +2 power bonus to Charisma based skill and ability checks until the end of your next turn.

fields.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light thrown weapon, or a sling.
fields.flavor: You shower your enemies in sharp metal.
fields.hit: 1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage.
fields.target: Each enemy in blast you can see
fields.name: Cloud of Steel

fields.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
fields.flavor: You deal a staggering blow, opening a hole in your enemy’s defenses.
fields.hit:
1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target takes a –1 penalty to AC and Reflex defense until the end of your next turn.

**Brutal Scoundrel**: The penalty to AC and Reflex defense is equal to your Strength modifier.
fields.name: Imperiling Strike

fields.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
fields.flavor: A gifted rogue can turn failure into fortune.
fields.miss:
Make a secondary attack against the target.

**Artful Dodger:** You gain a bonus to the attack roll for the secondary attack equal to your Charisma modifier. (1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage.)
fields.hit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage.
fields.name: Rogue's Luck

fields.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
fields.flavor: You scoop up a handful of sand or dirt or pebbles, strike your foe, and throw the grit in his face to blind him.
fields.hit: ￼1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is blinded until the end of your next turn.
fields.name: Sand in the Eyes

fields.flavor: You emit a draconic roar.An echo of the call bursts over your foe's head, buffeting your enemy as the sound bolsters you.
fields.hit: 3d8 + Charisma modifier thunder damage. You gain temporary hit points equal to 1d6 + your Strength modifier.
fields.name: Thunder Wyrm's Jaws

fields.flavor: As you strike one foe, you teleport next to another.
fields.hit: 2[W] + Wisdom modifier damage, and you teleport 10 squares to a space that must be adjacent to an enemy.
fields.name: Blade Step

fields.flavor: You utter a solemn prayer as you bring your weapon down upon your foe, invoking the power of your deity to physically bolster you and nearby allies.
fields.hit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you and each ally adjacent to the target can spend a healing surge. Add your Charisma modifier to the hit points regained.
fields.name: Strengthen the Faithful

fields.flavor: You use your weapon or shield to parry one blow after another, denying your foes the satisfaction of getting in a solid hit against you.
fields.hit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.
fields.name: Iron Bulwark
fields.effect: You gain a +1 power bonus to AC (or a +2 bonus if you're using a shield) until the end of your next turn.

fields.flavor: Your weapon flashes as it strikes, and moments later, a peal of thunder slams into your foe.
fields.attack: Strength vs. AC (can score a critical hit against a marked enemy on a roll of 19-20)
fields.hit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is knocked prone.
fields.name: Thunder Smite

fields.flavor: Like the hawk, you strike with calculated precision.
fields.attack: Strength vs. AC (melee) or Dexterity vs. AC (ranged). Gain a power bonus to this attack equal to your Wisdom modifier. Ignore any penalties from cover or concealment (but not superior cover or total concealment).
fields.hit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage (melee) or 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage (ranged).
fields.name: Hawk's Talon

fields.flavor: You assail your foe's mind with unreal images until he can see nothing else.
fields.hit:
1d10 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and you and all of your allies in range are invisible to the target until the end of your next turn.

**Fey Pact:** You gain a power bonus to Stealth checks equal to your Intelligence modifier until the end of the encounter.
fields.name: Mire the Mind

fields.flavor: From your outstretched hand erupt brilliant strokes of blue-white lightning.
fields.sec_target: Two creatures within 10 squares of the primary target
fields.hit: 2d6 + Intelligence modifier lightning damage.
fields.name: Lightning Bolt

fields.flavor: Your shout draws the enemy's attention so that your allies can maneuver around the foe, letting them get in close or get away.
fields.hit:
2d8 + Charisma modifier thunder damage, and the target takes a -5 penalty to opportunity attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

**Virtue of Cunning:** The penalty to opportunity attack rolls equals 4 + your Intelligence modifier.
fields.name: Distracting Shout

fields.flavor: You drop your guard as you come close for your attack, drawing primal strength from the violence directed at you.
fields.special: You can choose to provoke opportunity attacks when you make this attack. If you do so, you gain a +1 bonus to the attack roll for each creature that attacks you, and the attack deals 1[W] extra damage.
fields.hit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.
fields.name: Feast of Violence

fields.flavor: You snatch an item from an enemy during combat.
fields.prerequisite: You must be trained in Thievery.
fields.name: Dangerous Theft
fields.effect: On your next action, ignore the –10 penalty when you make a Thievery check to pick a pocket during combat.

fields.flavor: A mental bulwark helps to protect you against your foe's attack and renders the creature incapable of seeing you for a time.
fields.trigger: An enemy hits you with an attack that targets Will.
fields.name: Spirit's Eclipse
fields.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you gain a +5 bonus to Will and are invisible to the triggering enemy.

fields.requirement: You must be wielding a dagger and have scored a critical hit with a dagger against an enemy during this turn.
fields.flavor: Your first attack deals a critical wound, so you follow the attack with another strike.
fields.hit: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage.
fields.target: The same creature you hit with a critical hit
fields.name: Critical Opportunity

fields.flavor: You trap your enemies in a cage made of lightning and filled with roaring thunder.
fields.hit: 4d6 + Intelligence modifier lightning and thunder damage.
fields.name: Storm Cage
fields.effect: You conjure a wall in the 16 outer squares of the burst (forming a square enclosure). Any creature that starts its turn adjacent to the wall or moves into a wall square takes 10 lightning damage. Moving into a wall square costs 1 extra square of movement. The wall does not grant cover or concealment. It lasts until the end of your next turn.

fields.flavor: You slip your blade past your enemy’s armor and slice him just so, leaving a bleeding gash.
fields.special: This power can be used as an opportunity attack.
fields.hit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage.
fields.name: Precision Cut

fields.flavor: You blur into action, speeding across the battlefield to smash into your enemy in a halo of radiance. If your blow misses, the light conceals you.
fields.miss: You gain concealment until the end of your next turn.
fields.special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.
fields.hit: 2[W] + Wisdom modifier radiant damage, you push the target 2 squares, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.
fields.name: Radiant Rush

fields.flavor: The magic infused in your being bursts from your body, rending your foe with chaotic destruction.
fields.hit: 3d8 + Charisma modifier damage. Choose two damage types from among _acid, cold, fire, force, lightning, necrotic, poison, psychic, radiant, and thunder_. The attack deals damage of these two types. Until the end of your next turn, you gain combat advantage against all targets of your arcane attacks.
fields.name: Essence of Arcane Blood

fields.requirement: You make a successful melee attack with a light blade or heavy blade (not a polearm)
fields.flavor: With perfect timing, you flick one enemy’s blood into the eyes of another.
fields.target: One enemy other than the one you just hit
fields.name: Fantastic Flourish
fields.effect: The target is marked until the end of your next turn.

fields.flavor: Your body vanishes, leaving behind a miasma of rippling, sparking arcane energy
fields.name: Essence Form
fields.effect: You become insubstantial until the end of your next turn. If you hit with an arcane power while you are insubstantial, you gain temporary hit points equal to one-half your level + your Charisma modifier.

fields.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
fields.flavor: You bait your foe into attacking you, and then turn his blow straight back at him.
fields.hit: The target takes damage as if it were hit by its own melee basic attack. If you have combat advantage against the target, you can add your Sneak Attack damage.
fields.name: Fool's Opportunity

fields.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
fields.flavor: A well-timed attack leaves your enemy flailing helplessly for a few critical seconds.
fields.hit: 1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is stunned until the end of your next turn.
fields.name: Stunning Strike

fields.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
fields.flavor: Your weapon becomes a blur as you make swift, sweeping attacks against two foes, then hastily slip away.
fields.attack: Dexterity vs. AC, one attack per target
fields.hit:
2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you slide the target 2 squares.

**Artful Dodger**: You slide the target a number of squares equal to 1 + your Charisma modifier.
fields.name: Tornado Strike
fields.effect: You can move 3 squares after making the attack.

fields.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
fields.flavor: Ducking and weaving, you land a decisive blow that staggers your foe and sets it up for a tripping attack.
fields.hit: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target cannot shift until the end of your next turn. If the target provokes an opportunity attack from you before the start of your next turn, you gain a bonus to the attack roll and damage roll with the opportunity attack equal to your Strength modifier, and you knock the target prone on a hit.
fields.name: Unbalancing Attack

fields.flavor: A thunderous pulse of concussive energy rolls from your hand, bowling over your enemies.
fields.hit: 4d6 + Intelligence modifier thunder damage, and you push the target 4 squares.
fields.name: Thunderlance

fields.flavor: You immobilize your foes by commanding them to remain still.
fields.special: If you target only one creature with this power, you gain a +4 power bonus to the attack roll.
fields.attack: Intelligence vs. Will, one attack per target
fields.hit: 2d6 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.
fields.name: Mesmeric Hold

fields.flavor: You leap out of harm’s way just in time to avoid an attack.
fields.trigger: An enemy targets you with an attack
fields.prerequisite: You must be trained in Athletics.
fields.name: Leaping Dodge
fields.effect: Make an Athletics check to jump with a +5 power bonus and move the appropriate distance.

fields.flavor: You stand unseen in the midst of the battle, striking from your place of hiding.
fields.prerequisite: You must be trained in Stealth.
fields.name: Hide in Plain Sight
fields.effect: You must already be hidden to use this power. You are invisible until you leave your current square. No other action that you perform makes you visible.

fields.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
fields.flavor: With snarling ferocity, you attack. Your weapon bites deep into your enemy’s flesh, filling his heart with doubt.
fields.hit:
3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, you gain combat advantage against the target and a +1 power bonus to all defenses against its attacks.

**Artful Dodge**r: The power bonus is equal to your Charisma modifier.
fields.name: Hounding Strike

fields.flavor: You cause several foes to spontaneously burst into flame.
fields.hit: 5d6 + Intelligence modifier fire damage.
fields.name: Combust

fields.flavor: You trade damage for accuracy to land a much-needed hit on your opponent.
fields.hit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.
fields.name: Exacting Strike

fields.flavor: Silvery missiles spring from your fingertips and streak across the battlefield, striking your enemies with staggering force.
fields.attack: Intelligence vs. Reflex, one attack per target
fields.hit: 3d6 + Intelligence modifier force damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.
fields.name: Force Volley

fields.flavor: From your fingertips springs a tremendous stroke of blinding purple-white lightning that leaps from one enemy to another.
fields.special:
Tertiary Targets: All other enemies within 20 squares of you.
Attack: Intelligence vs. Reflex
Hit: 1d6 + Intelligence modifier lightning damage.
fields.sec_target: Two creatures within 5 squares of the primary target.
fields.hit: 4d6 + Intelligence modifier lightning damage.
fields.name: Chain Lightning

fields.flavor: You swing your weapon in deadly arcs, mercilessly hacking and slashing at your foe's armor until finally you break through.
fields.special: Weapon: If you're wielding an axe, you gain a bonus to the damage roll equal to your Constitution modifier.
fields.hit: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage.
fields.name: Hack 'n' Slash

fields.flavor: Darkness swirls around your foes, distracting them and cloaking you and your allies from view.
fields.hit: 3d6 + Intelligence modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, the target can gain line of sight only to the creature nearest to it (ally or enemy). If multiple creatures are equally near to the target, it can see all of them.
fields.name: Deceptive Shadows

fields.flavor: You call your opponents toward you and strike out with lashing blows.
fields.hit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.
fields.target: Each enemy in burst you can see
fields.name: Warrior’s Urging
fields.effect: Each target must shift 3 and end adjacent to you, if possible. A target that can’t end adjacent to you doesn’t move. You can then attack any targets that are adjacent to you (close burst 1).

fields.flavor: You narrow your eyes, and even minor deities know how it feels to be prey.
fields.target: An enemy marked by you or that is marking you
fields.name: Undying Enmity
fields.effect: You roll an extra d20 for the next attack you make and choose which die to use as the attack roll (you cannot reroll any of these attack rolls). If you are bloodied when you use this power, roll two extra d20s instead of one.

fields.flavor: Your vast learning grants you different insightful advantages in different situations.
fields.name: Trick of Knowledge
fields.effect:
You make an Arcana check and gain a benefit based on your check result until the end of the encounter.
30 or lower: No effect
31-35: +5 bonus to saving throws
36-40: +2 bonus to all defenses
41-45: +2 bonus to attack rolls with arcane powers
46-50: Make saving throws at the start of you turn instead of at the end of your turn
51-55: Pick two benefits you can gain from a roll of 31 through 50
56-60 Pick three benefits you can gain from a roll of 31 through 50
61 or higher: Gain all four benefits you can gain from a roll of 31 through 50

fields.flavor: You crook your hand in a mystical gesture, and your foes shriek in agony as their souls are consumed by hidden flame.
fields.hit: 3d8 + Intelligence modifier fire and necrotic damage, and the target is weakened until the end of your next turn.
fields.name: Soul Fire

fields.flavor: You will not be denied your enemy's blood, and other foes that witness your savage attack know the ill fate that awaits them.
fields.hit: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage.
fields.name: Indomitable Battle Strike
fields.effect: All of your enemies within 10 squares of you are marked until the end of your next turn.

fields.flavor: A blast of crackling black fire erupts from your hand, charring the flesh and burning the souls of your foes.
fields.hit: 6d6 + Intelligence modifier fire and necrotic damage.
fields.name: Black Fire

fields.requirement: You must be raging and have at least one unused barbarian rage power.
fields.flavor: You channel your primal rage into a devastating attack.
fields.miss: Half damage.
fields.special: You can use this power twice per day.
fields.attack: Strength vs. AC. To make this attack, you expend an unused barbarian rage power.
fields.hit:
You deal damage based on the level of the rage power you expend:

_1st level:_ 3[W] + Strength modifier
_5th level:_ 4[W] + Strength modifier
_9th level:_ 5[W] + Strength modifier
_15th level:_ 6[W] + Strength modifier
_19th level:_ 7[W] + Strength modifier
_25th level:_ 8[W] + Strength modifier
_29th level:_ 9[W] + Strength modifier
fields.name: Rage Strike

fields.requirement:
ou must be wielding a crossbow, a light
thrown weapon, or a sling.
fields.flavor: A rapid barrage of projectiles leaves your enemies clearing the blood from their eyes.
fields.miss: Half damage, and the target is not blinded.
fields.hit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is blinded until the end of your next turn.
fields.target: Each enemy in blast you can see
fields.name: Blinding Barrage

fields.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
fields.flavor: You deal a staggering blow to your enemy, setting it up for future attacks.
fields.miss: Half damage, and the target grants combat advantage to you until the end of your next turn.
fields.hit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is slowed and grants combat advantage to you (save ends both).
fields.name: Easy Target

fields.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
fields.flavor: Through a series of feints and lures, you maneuver your foe right where you want him.
fields.hit: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you slide the target 1 square.
fields.name: Trick Strike
fields.effect: Until the end of the encounter, each time you hit the target you slide it 1 square.

fields.flavor: ￼You exhale a blast of lightning at your foes. The lightning then forms a ring around you, repelling nearby attackers.
fields.miss: Half damage.
fields.hit: 3d8 + Charisma modifier lightning damage.
fields.name: Lightning Breath
fields.effect:
Until the end of your next turn, whenever an enemy hits you with a melee attack, you push that enemy 1 square.

**Dragon Magic**: The enemy also takes 5 lightning damage.

fields.flavor: You swear an oath that you will slay the foe before you. As long as you work to fulfill this oath, that foe cannot escape.
fields.miss: Half damage.
fields.hit: 2[W] + Wisdom modifier damage.
fields.name: Oath of the Final Duel
fields.effect: Until the end of the encounter, if the target is more than 3 squares away from you at the start of your turn, you can teleport to a space within 3 squares of it as a minor action. This effect ends if you end your turn more than 3 squares away from the target.

fields.flavor: A burst of divine energy harms your foes and heals your allies. The radiant energy lingers around your holy symbol and improves your healing powers for the rest of the battle.
fields.hit: The target is weakened until the end of its next turn.
fields.name: Beacon of Hope
fields.effect: You and all your allies in the burst regain 5 hit points, and your healing powers restore +5 hit points until the end of the encounter.

fields.flavor: A timely strike against a hated foe invigorates you, giving you the strength and resolve to fight on.
fields.hit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you can spend a healing surge.
fields.name: Comeback Strike

fields.flavor: You invoke prayer that wracks your foe with terrible pain and causes further pain whenever he makes an attack.
fields.miss: Half damage. Once per round, the target takes 1d4 damage after making any attacks on its turn (save ends).
fields.hit: 3d8 + Charisma modifier damage. Once per round, the target takes 1d8 damage after making any attacks on its turn (save ends).
fields.name: On Pain of Death

fields.flavor: You fire two arrows at once, which separate in mid-flight to strike two different targets.
fields.attack: Dexterity vs. AC. Make two attack rolls, take the higher result, and apply it to both targets.
fields.hit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage.
fields.target: Two creatures within 3 squares of each other
fields.name: Split the Tree

fields.flavor: You create a fist-sized orb of painful blue-white radiance that whirls around your enemy, searing him. Fierce rays shoot from it like jabbing daggers of light, fencing him in where he stands.
fields.hit: 3d6 + Charisma modifier radiant damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.
fields.name: Dread Star
fields.effect: The target takes a -2 penalty to Will defense (save ends).

fields.flavor: A shimmering arrow of green, glowing liquid streaks to your target and bursts in a spray of sizzling acid.
fields.miss: Half damage, and ongoing 2 acid damage to primary target (save ends), and no secondary attack.
fields.sec_target: Each creature adjacent to the primary target
fields.sec_hit: 1d8 + Intelligence modifier acid damage, and ongoing 5 acid damage (save ends).
fields.hit: 2d8 + Intelligence modifier acid damage, and ongoing 5 acid damage (save ends). Make a secondary attack.
fields.name: Acid Arrow

fields.flavor: You conjure a rolling ball of fire and control where it goes.
fields.hit: 2d6 + Intelligence modifier fire damage.
fields.sustain_text: You can sustain this power until the end of the encounter. As a standard action, you can make another attack with the sphere.
fields.target: One creature adjacent to the flaming sphere
fields.name: Flaming Sphere
fields.effect: You conjure a Medium flaming sphere in an unoccupied square within range, and the sphere attacks an adjacent creature. Any creature that starts its turn next to the flaming sphere takes 1d4 + Intelligence modifier fire damage. As a move action, you can move the sphere up to 6 squares.

fields.flavor: Your shout of wrath stabs into your foe's mind. Each time your allies hit that foe, they draw strength from its weakness.
fields.miss: Until the end of the encounter, whenever an ally hits the target, that ally regains hit points equal to your Charisma modifier.
fields.hit: 2d6 + Charisma modifier psychic damage.
fields.name: Stirring Shout

fields.flavor: Your rage surges up from the depths of your pain to bring pain to the wounded.
fields.miss: Half damage.
fields.hit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage.
fields.name: Bloodhunt Rage
fields.effect: You enter the rage of the bloodhunt. Until the rage ends, you gain a bonus to melee damage rolls equal to your Constitution modifier if either you or your target is bloodied.

fields.flavor: With the death of your foe, your god grants you a boon.
fields.trigger: Your oath of enmity target drops to 0 hit points.
fields.name: Blessing of Vengeance
fields.effect: You gain temporary hit points equal to your healing surge value.

fields.flavor: You step into an attack made against an ally to save your comrade.
fields.trigger: An adjacent ally is hit by a melee or a ranged attack.
fields.name: Martyr's Blessing
fields.effect: You are hit by the attack instead.

fields.flavor: Your form blurs as you hastily withdraw from the battlefield.
fields.name: Expeditious Retreat
fields.effect: You shift up to twice your speed.

fields.flavor: The alignment of elements within you changes at your command.
fields.name: Elemental Shift
fields.effect:
You can change the resistance granted by your Dragon Soul or Wild Soul to one of the other damage types for the rest of the encounter. In addition, one ally adjacent to you gains resist 5 to the damage type that you resist until the end of the encounter.

Level 11: Resist 10.

Level 21: Resist 15.

fields.flavor: You shake off the worst of your wounds.
fields.name: Boundless Endurance
fields.effect: You gain regeneration 2 + your Constitution modifier when you are bloodied.

fields.flavor: Your magic creates shouts of encouragement, making it seem as though an entire army were cheering on your allies.
fields.name: Song of Courage
fields.effect:
The burst creates a zone of inspirational shouts that lasts until the end of your next turn. When you move, the zone moves with you, remaining centered on you.
While within the zone, any ally gains a +1 power bonus to attack rolls.

fields.flavor: A gleaming shield of divine energy appears over you, granting you and nearby allies protection against attacks.
fields.target: You and each ally in burst
fields.name: Shield of Faith
fields.effect: The targets gain a +2 power bonus to AC until the end of the encounter.

fields.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
fields.flavor: You follow up a fierce attack with a series of quick, painful strikes woven between your enemy’s attacks.
fields.hit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage.
fields.name: Clever Riposte
fields.effect: Until the end of the encounter, the target takes damage equal to your Dexterity modifier each time it attacks you, and you can shift as an immediate reaction after such an attack.

fields.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
fields.flavor: Each drop of blood is another nail in your enemy’s coffin.
fields.miss: Half damage, and no ongoing damage.
fields.hit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and ongoing damage equal to 5 + your Strength modifier (save ends).
fields.name: Deep Cut

fields.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
fields.flavor: You topple your enemy with a crippling blow and force him to stumble around the battlefield.
fields.miss: Half damage, and the target is not knocked prone.
fields.hit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is knocked prone. Until the end of the encounter, if the target moves more than half its speed in a single action, it falls prone at the end of its movement.
fields.name: Walking Wounded

fields.flavor: ￼￼￼A bolt of lightning leaps from your fingers to strike at your foe, twisting past obstacles.
fields.miss: Half damage.
fields.attack: Charisma vs. Reflex. The attack ignores cover and concealment, but not superior cover or total concealment.
fields.hit: 3d10 + Charisma modifier lightning damage.
fields.name: Serpentine Blast

fields.flavor: You place a burning mark of divine radiance on your foe as you swear an oath to destroy this creature. With every wound you inflict on the creature, the burning mark erupts in searing light.
fields.miss: Half damage. Whenever you hit the target with a divine power, the target takes 1d4 extra radiant damage (save ends).
fields.hit:
2d10 + Wisdom radiant damage. Whenever you hit the target with a divine power, the target takes 1d6 extra radiant damage (save ends).

Aftereffect: Whenever you hit the target with a divine power, the target takes 1d4 extra radiant damage (save ends).
fields.name: Oath of Consuming Light

fields.flavor: With a wave of your hand, jagged lines of radiant light spread across the ground around you like a crackling web, moving at your whim. Enemies that stand upon this ground suffer the wrath of your deity.
fields.name: Consecrated Ground
fields.effect: The burst creates a zone of sanctified ground that lasts until the end of your next turn. You can move the origin square of the zone 3 squares as a move action. Enemies that start their turns while within the zone take 1d6 + your Charisma modifier radiant damage. You and any allies who are bloodied and start their turns within the zone regain hit points equal to 1 + your Charisma modifier.

fields.flavor: You break through your enemy's armor and deal a painful bleeding wound.
fields.hit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target takes ongoing 5 damage and a -2 penalty to AC (save ends both).
fields.name: Crack the Shell

fields.flavor: You cause a nearby foe to convulse with pain and render it more susceptible to radiant energy.
fields.miss: Half damage, and the target gains no vulnerability.
fields.hit: 3d8 + Charisma modifier radiant damage, and the target gains vulnerability 5 to radiant damage until the end of the encounter.
fields.name: Sign of Vulnerability

fields.flavor: Your arrow burrows into flesh and shatters, sending splinters of wood deep into the wound.
fields.miss: Half damage, and the target takes a -1 penalty to attack rolls until the end of the encounter.
fields.hit: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of the encounter.
fields.name: Splintering Shot

fields.flavor: You cause an illusory, twisted crown to appear around the target's head. Under its psychic assault, your enemy loses the ability to distinguish friend from foe.
fields.miss: Half damage.
fields.hit: 2d6 + Charisma modifier psychic damage.
fields.sustain_text: The target makes a melee basic attack against one of its adjacent allies of your choice (save ends).
fields.name: Crown of Madness

fields.flavor: You call forth a thick cloud of bilious yellow vapors. The foul fumes overwhelm any creature within.
fields.hit: 1d10 + Intelligence modifier poison damage.
fields.name: Stinking Cloud
fields.effect: The burst creates a zone of poisonous vapor that blocks line of sight until the end of your next turn. Creatures that enter the zone or start their turns there take 1d10 + Intelligence modifier poison damage. As a move action, you can move the zone up to 6 squares.

fields.flavor: You conjure a giant floating hand made of chiseled ice that clutches foes and freezes them.
fields.hit: 2d8 + Intelligence modifier cold damage, and the hand grabs the target. If the target attempts to escape, the hand uses your Fortitude or Reflex defense.
fields.sustain_text: A target grabbed by the hand takes 1d8 + Intelligence modifier cold damage when you sustain this power. As a standard action, you can attack another target with the hand, but it must release a target it has grabbed.
fields.target: One creature adjacent to the hand
fields.name: Bigby's Icy Grasp

fields.flavor: You call into being a giant web made of thick magical strands that hand in midair, trapping those within it.
fields.hit: The target is immobilized (save ends).
fields.name: Web
fields.effect: The burst creates a zone of webs that fills the area until the end of the encounter or for 5 minutes. The zone is considered difficult terrain. Any creature that ends it move in the web is immobilized (save ends).

fields.flavor: Your verse mocks your foes' courage, forcing them to become the cowards you describe.
fields.miss: Half damage.
fields.hit: 2d6 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and the target is affected by your satire of bravery (save ends). While the target is affected by the satire, if the target ends its turn closer to you than where it started its turn, the target takes 1d6 + Charisma modifier psychic damage and is dazed until the end of its next turn.
fields.name: Satire of Bravery
fields.effect: You push the target 3 squares.

fields.flavor: Your thunderous attack dazes your foe as you channel the great spirit hawk whose wings rumble across the sky. Your screaming charge blasts your enemies with thunder.
fields.miss: Half damage.
fields.sec_hit: You knock the secondary target prone.
fields.hit: 2[W] + Strength modifier thunder damage, and the primary target is dazed (save ends).
fields.name: Thunder Hawk Rage

fields.flavor: You are the eyes and ears of the group, always alert for the telltale signs of an ambush.
fields.name: Evade Ambush
fields.effect: At the start of a surprise round in which any allies are surprised, use this power to allow a number of allies equal to you Wisdom modifier to avoid being surprised.

fields.flavor: You are swathed in rippling flames that turn away both fire and chill but scorch anyone who strikes you.
fields.name: Fire Shield
fields.effect: You gain resist 10 cold and resist 10 fire until the end of the encounter. Whenever a creature make a melee attack roll against you, it takes 2d6 + your Intelligence modifier fire damage. No creature can take this damage more than once per turn.

fields.flavor: With a soldier's discipline, you fend off attacks that would overcome a lesser person.
fields.name: Defensive Training
fields.effect: Gain a +2 power bonus to your Fortitude, Reflex or Will defense.

fields.flavor: As your weapon connects with your enemies, so too does the magic of your god connect you to your allies.
fields.name: Divine Bodyguard
fields.effect: Choose an ally within 5 squares of you. You take half that ally's damage until the end of the encounter or until you end the effect as a free action. No power or effect can reduce the damage you take from this power.

fields.flavor: You pound across the battlefield, leaving no opening as you move and drawing strength from the numbers arrayed against you.
fields.name: Indomitable Shift
fields.effect: You shift a number of squares equal to your Constitution modifier. You gain 1d10 temporary hit points plus 1 additional temporary hit point for each enemy within 2 squares of you.

fields.flavor: Suffering a foe's lucky attack, you call on your god to visit your pain upon the one you have sworn to kill.
fields.trigger: An enemy scores a critical hit against you.
fields.target: Your oath of enmity target in burst
fields.name: Wrath of the Divine
fields.effect: The target takes radiant damage equal to the critical hit's damage.

fields.flavor: Your magic turns an enemy's blunder into an opportunity for your allies to overcome their wounds.
fields.trigger: An attack misses an ally within 10 squares of you.
fields.target: Each ally in burst missed by the triggering attack
fields.name: Trickster's Healing
fields.effect: Each target regains hit points equal to one-half your level + your Intelligence modifier.

fields.flavor: You unleash a ray of crackling arcane energy that destroys a magical effect created by an opponent.
fields.attack: Intelligence vs. the Will defense of the creator of the conjuration or the zone
fields.hit: The conjuration or the zone is destroyed. All its effects end, including those that normally last until a target saves.
fields.name: Dispel Magic

fields.flavor: You utter a simple prayer and gain the power to instantly heal wounds, and your touch momentarily suffuses you or a wounded creature with bright silver light.
fields.name: Cure Serious Wounds
fields.effect: The target regains hit points as if it had spent two healing surges.

fields.flavor: A creature you choose vanishes from sight.
fields.sustain_text: If the target is within range, you can sustain the effect.
fields.name: Invisibility
fields.effect: The target is invisible until the end of your next turn. If the target attacks, the target becomes visible.

fields.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
fields.flavor: You deal your enemy a vicious wound that continues to bleed, and like a shark, you circle in for the kill.
fields.miss: Half damage, and no ongoing damage.
fields.hit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target takes ongoing damage equal to 5 + your Strength modifier and grants combat advantage to you (save ends both).
fields.name: Crimson Edge

fields.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
fields.flavor: You adroitly outmaneuver your enemy, pushing and baiting him with every stride and strike.
fields.attack: You slide the target to any other square adjacent to you, and then make a Dexterity vs. AC attack.
fields.hit: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage.
fields.name: Deadly Positioning
fields.effect: Until the end of the encounter, as long as you are adjacent to the target, you slide the target 1 square before making a melee attack against it.

fields.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
fields.flavor: A well-placed blow takes your foe out of the fight.
fields.miss: Half damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.
fields.hit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is knocked unconscious (save ends). If the unconscious target takes any damage, it is no longer unconscious.
fields.name: Knockout

fields.flavor: You unleash a thunderous roar to batter your enemies, and scales like those of an adamantine dragon cover your skin.
fields.miss: Ongoing 5 thunder damage (save ends).
fields.hit: 2d6 + Charisma modifier thunder damage, and ongoing 5 thunder damage (save ends).
fields.name: Adamantine Echo
fields.effect:
You gain a +2 power bonus to AC until the end of the encounter.

**Dragon Magic**: The power bonus to AC equals your Strength modifier.

fields.flavor: At the touch of your weapon, your foe relives its misdeeds. Only by standing still can it keep the painful visions at bay.
fields.miss: Half damage. Until the end of your next turn, the target takes 5 psychic damage for each square it enters willingly.
fields.hit: 2[W] + Wisdom modifier damage. The target takes 5 psychic damage for each square it enters willingly (save ends).
fields.name: Blade of Guilt

fields.flavor: You are as slippery as an eel.
fields.prerequisite: You must be trained in Acrobatics.
fields.name: Certain Freedom
fields.effect: You automatically succeed on an Acrobatics check to escape from a grab or to escape from restraints.

fields.flavor: You take cover beneath a much larger creature, making it harder for the creature to hit you.
fields.special: Allies of the target creature can attack you without penalty.
fields.prerequisite: You must be trained in Acrobatics.
fields.name: Close Quarters
fields.effect: Move into the space of an adjacent creature larger than you and at least Large in size. (It gets its usual oppor- tunity attack against you as you leave an adjacent square.) You gain combat advantage against the creature, and it takes a –4 penalty to attack rolls against you. When the creature moves, you move along with it, staying in the same portion of the creature’s space. The creature can make a Strength or Dexterity vs. Reflex attack (as a stan- dard action with no penalty) to slide you into an adjacent square and end this effect.

fields.flavor: You cloak yourself with a shimmering aura, making your outline almost impossible to discern.
fields.name: Blur
fields.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you gain a +2 power bonus to all defenses, and enemies 5 or more squares away from you cannot see you.

fields.flavor: You make yourself or another creature in range resistant to a particular kind of damage.
fields.name: Resistence
fields.effect: Against a particular damage type chosen by you, the target gains resistance equal to your level + your Intelligence modifier until the end of the encounter or for 5 minutes. Choose the damage type from the following list: acid, cold, fire, force, lightning, necrotic, poison, psychic, radiant, or thunder.

fields.flavor: Divine power flows through you, allowing you to shrug off injury after injury.
fields.name: River of Life
fields.effect: You gain regeneration 5 until the end of the encounter.

fields.flavor: The fact that your enemy is too cowardly to close to melee swells your confidence.
fields.trigger: You are hit by a ranged attack.
fields.name: Shooter's Nemesis
fields.effect: You spend a healing surge and regain additional hit points equal to twice your Wisdom modifier.

fields.flavor: With a moment of concentration, you focus your will into the point of your blade.
fields.name: Meditation of the Blade
fields.effect: Until the end of the encounter, your dagger’s damage die increases by one size.

fields.flavor: Your lower body fades into swirling mist as you gain mastery of your airborne movement.
fields.name: Wings of Angels
fields.effect: Until the stance ends, your fly speed increases by 4, and you can hover. In addition, while you aren't bloodied, you gain regeneration equal to your Wisdom modifier.

fields.flavor: With a wave of your hand, you create an area of torrential rain that creatures have difficulty passing through.
fields.name: Sudden Storm
fields.effect: The burst creates a zone of wind and rain that lasts until the end of your next turn. Squares in the zone are difficult terrain and are lightly obscured. As a move action, you can move the zone up to 5 squares.

fields.flavor: You dash across the battlefield, leaving bewildered and bleeding enemies in your wake.
fields.name: Bloody Path
fields.effect: You can move your speed. Every enemy that can make an opportunity attack against you as a result of this movement attacks itself with its opportunity attack, rather than you. Any enemy that can make an opportunity attack against you during this movement must do so. It cannot refrain from making the attack to avoid harming itself.

fields.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
fields.flavor: The more your enemy struggles, the less you want to let him go.
fields.special: You can use this power as a minor action if you have already grabbed a creature. Doing so requires no attack roll.
fields.hit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you grab the target. Until the target escapes, you have cover, and any melee attack or ranged attack that misses you hits the target instead.
fields.sustain_text: Sustain the grab for another round. The third time you sustain the grab after using this power, the target falls unconscious.
fields.name: Garrote Grip

fields.requirement:
You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade,
or a sling.
fields.flavor: A ruthless strike yields great rewards, for after death comes the looting.
fields.miss: Half damage.
fields.special: If the target is bloodied, this attack does 5[W] + Dexterity modifier + Strength modifier damage on a hit (half damage on a miss) and can score a critical hit on a roll of 17–20.
fields.hit: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage.
fields.name: Slaying Strike

fields.flavor: You twirl your weapon about and test the defenses of nearby foes while expertly parrying their blows.
fields.name: Unyielding Avalanche
fields.effect: You gain regeneration equal to you Constitution modifier, a +1 power bonus to AC, and a +1 power bonus to saving throws. Any enemy that starts its turn adjacent to you takes 1[W] damage and is slowed until the end of its turn, as long as you are able to make opportunity attacks.

fields.flavor: You tug on a lock a certain way, and just like that, it snaps open.
fields.prerequisite: You must be trained in Thievery.
fields.name: Foil the Lock
fields.effect: On your next action, gain a +10 power bonus when you make a Thievery check to open a lock. If the check succeeds, the lock opens at once.

fields.flavor: You focus on the precision of your attacks, at the expense of hiding the chinks in your own armor.
fields.prerequisite: You must be trained in Bluff.
fields.name: Raise the Stakes
fields.effect: Until the end of your next turn, any of your attacks can score a critical hit on a roll of 17–20, and any attack against you can score a critical hit on a roll of 19–20.

fields.flavor: Like a tankard of bad ale, you don't go down easy.
fields.name: Iron Warrior
fields.effect: You spend a healing surge, regain additional hit points equal to 2d6 + your Constitution modifier, and make a saving throw against one effect that a save can end.

fields.flavor: As your foes close in for the kill, you buy the time for escape with a cunningly crafted duplicate of yourself.
fields.name: Clever Escape
fields.effect:
You become invisible and teleport 6 squares. You leave behind an illusory image of yourself in the space you occupied. The illusion stands in place, takes no actions, and uses your defenses if it is attacked. It lasts until the end of the encounter or until it is touched or hit by an attack. Your invisibility lasts until the end of your next turn or until you make an attack roll.
A creature can recognize the illusion by making a successful Insight check (DC 15 + one-half your level + your Intelligence modifier).

fields.flavor: You sprinkle a tiny pinch of diamond dust over the subject, and his skin turns gray and hard as granite.
fields.name: Stoneskin
fields.effect: The target gains resist 10 to all damage until the end of the encounter or for 5 minutes.

fields.flavor: Wriggling, ebon tentacles of necrotic energy erupt from the ground, grasping toward every creature within reach.
fields.hit: 2d10 + Intelligence modifier necrotic damage, and the target is immobilized (save ends).
fields.name: Edvard's Black Tentacles
fields.effect:
The burst creates a zone of difficult terrain that lasts until the end of your next turn.
Sustain Minor: When you sustain the power, repeat the attack against any creature within the zone that is not immobilized, and deal 1d10 necrotic damage to creatures that are immobilized.

fields.flavor: You fire a green ray from your wand. Whatever the emerald beam hits disappears in a puff of gray dust.
fields.miss: 3d10 + Intelligence modifier damage, and ongoing 5 damage (save ends).
fields.special: You don’t need to make an attack roll to hit an unattended object with this power.
fields.hit: 5d10 + Intelligence modifier damage, and ongoing 10 damage (save ends). If the target saves, it takes ongoing 5 damage (save ends).
fields.name: Distintegrate

fields.flavor: You thrash your foes with a devastating array of strikes, and then unleash your fury a second time against anyone left standing.
fields.miss: Half damage.
fields.sec_target: Any enemy that moves adjacent to you or starts its turn adjacent to you
fields.hit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage.
fields.target: Each enemy in burst you can see
fields.name: Devastation's Wake

fields.flavor: Yellow-green vapors emerge from the ground with a hiss, forming a thick, toxic cloud.
fields.hit: 1d10 + Intelligence modifier poison damage.
fields.name: Cloudkill
fields.effect: The burst creates a zone of poisonous vapors that lasts until the end of your next turn. A creature that enters the zone or starts its turn there takes 1d10 + Intelligence modifier poison damage. As a move action, you can move the zone 3 squares.

fields.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
fields.flavor: After striking boldly, you frustrate your foe by shifting away just as he’s about to attack you.
fields.hit: 6[W] + Dexterity modifier damage.
fields.name: Snake's Retreat
fields.effect: When the target makes a melee attack or a ranged attack against you, you can shift 1 square as an immediate interrupt. The target can make a saving throw to end this effect.

fields.requirement: You must be wielding a dagger.
fields.flavor: Your dagger springs forward, plunging deep into your foe.
fields.miss: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and no ongoing damage.
fields.hit: 4[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and ongoing 10 damage (save ends). On a critical hit, ongoing 20 damage (save ends).
fields.name: Deep Dagger Wound

fields.flavor: Arcane winds and a hailstorm of force energy surrounds you, battering your enemies and teleporting them from one place to another.
fields.miss: Half damage, and no teleportation.
fields.hit: 3d8 + Intelligence modifier force damage, and you can teleport the target to a location of your choice within the burst.
fields.name: Maelstrom of Chaos

fields.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade or a heavy blade (not a polearm).
fields.flavor: With a tremendous roar, you swing your blade over your head and make lunging strikes at all nearby enemies. At the end of the flurry, you regain some of your power.
fields.hit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.
fields.target: Each enemy in burst you can see
fields.name: Crescendo Sword
fields.effect: If you hit at least one of your enemies, you regain one daily power you have already used. If you miss all enemies, you regain one encounter power you have already used.

fields.flavor: You take to the sky, your weapon aglow. You swoop and strike repeatedly as you dart past your foes.
fields.hit: 2[W] + Wisdom modifier radiant damage. If you hit two creatures, the second is dazed (save ends). If you hit three creatures, the third is stunned (save ends).
fields.name: Celestial Skirmish
fields.effect: You fly your speed +2. During this movement, you gain a +6 bonus to AC against opportunity attacks. At any point during the movement, you can make the following attack three times, each time against a different target.

fields.flavor: As you strike out with an explosion of magical force, your body is veiled in swirls of kaleidoscopic color that protect you from attacks.
fields.miss: Half damage.
fields.hit: 4d6 + Charisma modifier force damage.
fields.name: Protective Essence
fields.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you gain resist 5 to all damage. Until the end of the encounter, each time you use an arcane power, each enemy adjacent to you takes damage equal to your Charisma modifier.

fields.flavor: Your mastery of the arcane arts allows you to push your mind far beyond its limits, tapping into reserves of magic that allow your spells to endure.
fields.name: Mordenkainen's Lucubration
fields.effect: Until the end of the encounter or until you become unconscious, your arcane powers that can be sustained instead last until the end of the encounter.

fields.flavor: You refuse to go down, turning a death blow into one last chance for victory.
fields.trigger: Your hit points drop to 0 or lower
fields.name: No Surrender
fields.effect: You regain hit points to bring you to one-half your maximum hit points. However, you take a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of the encounter.

fields.flavor: White motes of light fly from your fingertips and swirl about, lifting you and your allies off the ground and granting each of you the power of flight.
fields.special: You can sustain this power until the end of the encounter or for 5 minutes. If you don’t sustain this power, all targets float to the ground without taking falling damage.
fields.target: You and each ally in burst
fields.name: Mass Fly
fields.effect: All targets gain a speed of fly 8 until the end of your next turn.

fields.flavor: Every enemy within your reach falls victim to the ruthless precision of your attack and suffers bleeding wounds.
fields.name: Reaper's Stance
fields.effect: Whenever you use a fighter power, you can score a critical hit on a roll of 19-20, and you gain a power bonus to damage rolls equal to your Dexterity modifier. Any enemy that starts its turn adjacent to you takes 1[W] damage and ongoing 10 damage (save ends), as long as you are able to make opportunity attacks.

fields.flavor: You call up a spinning vortex of elemental energy that inexorably draws everything around it toward seeming destruction.
fields.miss: Half damage, and no pull.
fields.hit: 6d6 + Intelligence modifier damage of a type chosen from the following list: acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder. In addition, the target is pulled 2 squares toward the maw’s origin square.
fields.name: Elemental Maw
fields.effect: This attack’s origin square becomes a vortex of energy. The burst creates an area of difficult terrain. The effect remains until the end of your next turn. Any creature that is pulled into the vortex takes 3d6 + Intelligence modifier damage of a type chosen from the following list: acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder. In addition, you teleport that creature to a square within 20 squares of you. The creature arrives at its destination prone and dazed until the start of your next turn.
fields.damage_type: Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning or Thunder

fields.flavor: You create an intricate illusion in your enemy's mind, convincing it that friends are foes and leading it wherever you desire.
fields.miss: Until the end of your next turn, whenever the target makes a melee or ranged attack roll, you can change the target of that attack. If it makes an area attack, you choose the attack's origin square if applicable. The target cannot attack itself in this way.
fields.hit: The target is affected by phantom reality (save ends). While it is affected by phantom reality, whenever the target makes a melee or ranged attack roll, you can change the target of that attack. If it makes an area attack, you choose the attack's origin square if applicable. The target cannot attack itself in this way. Also, whenever the target moves, you can slide it 4 squares after it completes its movement.
fields.name: Phantom Reality

fields.flavor: You toss a green toward your enemies. It explodes, showering them with acid and creating a boiling pool of caustic stuff that moves at your command.
fields.miss: Half damage.
fields.sec_hit: The secondary target is blinded until the end of its current turn.
fields.trigger: Secondary Action Trigger: A creature enters the zone or starts its turn there. (This is an Opportunity Action, Close Burst 1).
fields.hit: 6d6 + Intelligence modifier acid damage.
fields.name: Bubbling Acid

fields.flavor: A spinning cloud of flaming ash surrounds your enemies, burning them and blinding their allies
fields.miss: Half damage, and ongoing 5 fire damage (save ends).
fields.sec_hit:
Opportunity Action - Close burst 5

1d8 + Intelligence modifier fire damage, and the secondary target is blinded until the end of its next turn.
fields.trigger: Secondary Attack Trigger: A creature fails its saving throw against this power's ongoing damage.
fields.hit: 5d6 + Intelligence modifier fire damage, and ongoing 10 fire damage (save ends).
fields.name: Cinder Storm

fields.flavor: Your eyes darken, becoming black orbs as you command your enemies to stop in their tracks.
fields.miss: Half damage, and the target is dazed (save ends).
fields.hit: 2d10 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage, and the target is stunned (save ends).
fields.name: Legion's Hold

fields.flavor: Fiery orbs rain down from above, shrieking loudly as they fall. They smash into your foes, obliterating them in a storm of fire and scorching the ground.
fields.miss: Half damage.
fields.hit: 8d6 + Intelligence modifier fire damage.
fields.name: Meteor Swarm

fields.flavor: Black dust whirls up around your foes, sapping their strength and clouding their vision.
fields.miss: Half damage.
fields.hit: 5d6 + Intelligence modifier necrotic damage, and the target is weakened (save ends).
fields.name: Miasma of Enfeeblement
fields.effect: The burst creates a zone of clinging black dust that blocks lie of sight for all creatures damaged by this power until the end of your next turn.

fields.flavor: With blood-curdling cries, your enemies fall upon each other.
fields.miss: The target is stunned until the end of your next turn.
fields.hit: The target is dominated (save ends). If you do not compel the target to make any attack rolls during its turn, it automatically saves to end this condition at the end of that turn. If you compel the target to make any attack rolls but it does not hit any creatures, it automatically fails saving throws against this condition until the start of its next turn.
fields.name: Visions of Wrath

fields.flavor: Let nothing stand between a warrior and the object of his wrath.
fields.hit: 7[W] + Strength modifier damage.
fields.name: No Mercy
Channel Divinity
fields.description:
Once per encounter you can invoke divine power, fill- ing yourself with the might of your patron deity. With the divine might you invoke you can wield special powers, such as _turn undead_ and _divine fortune_. Some clerics learn other uses for this feature; for instance, the divinity feats in Chapter 6 grant characters with access to the Channel Divinity class feature the ability to use additional special powers.

Regardless of how many different uses for Channel Divinity you know, you can use only one such ability per encounter. The special ability or power you invoke works just like your other powers.

fields.name: Healer’s Lore
fields.description: Your study of healing allows you to make the most of your healing prayers. When you grant healing with one of your cleric powers that has the healing key- word, add your Wisdom modifier to the hit points the recipient regains.

fields.name: Healing Word
fields.description: Using the _healing word_ power, clerics can grant their comrades additional resilience with nothing more than a short prayer.

fields.name: Ritual Casting
fields.description: You gain the Ritual Caster feat (_page 200, PHB I_) as a bonus feat, allowing you to use magical rituals (see Chapter 10). You possess a ritual book, and it contains two rituals you have mastered: the Gentle Repose ritual and one other 1st-level ritual of your choice.

fields.name: Combat Challenge
fields.description:
In combat, it’s dangerous to ignore a fighter. Every time you attack an enemy, whether the attack hits or misses, you can choose to mark that target. The mark lasts until the end of your next turn. While a target is marked, it takes a –2 penalty to attack rolls for any attack that doesn’t include you as a target. A creature can be subject to only one mark at a time. A new mark supersedes a mark that was already in place.

In addition, whenever a marked enemy that is adjacent to you shifts or makes an attack that does not include you, you can make a melee basic attack against that enemy as an immediate interrupt.

fields.name: Combat Superiority
fields.description: You gain a bonus to opportunity attacks equal to your Wisdom modifier. An enemy struck by your oppor- tunity attack stops moving, if a move provoked the attack. If it still has actions remaining, it can use them to resume moving.

fields.name: Fighter Weapon Talent
fields.description: Choose either one-handed or two-handed weapons. When using a weapon of your chosen style, you gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls.

fields.name: First Strike
fields.description: At the start of an encounter, you have combat advantage against any creatures that have not yet acted in that encounter.

fields.name: Rogue Tactics
fields.description:
Rogues operate in a variety of ways. Some rogues use their natural charm and cunning trickery to deceive foes. Others rely on brute strength to overcome their enemies.

Choose one of the following options:

**Artful Dodger**: You gain a bonus to AC equal to your Charisma modifier against opportunity attacks.

**Brutal Scoundrel**: You gain a bonus to Sneak Attack damage equal to your Strength modifier.

The choice you make also provides bonuses to certain rogue powers. Individual powers detail the effects (if any) your Rogue Tactics selection has on them.

fields.name: Rogue Weapon Talent
fields.description: When you wield a shuriken, your weapon damage die increases by one size. When you wield a dagger, you gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls.

fields.name: Sneak Attack
fields.description:
Once per round, when you have combat advantage against an enemy and are using a weapon from the light blade, the crossbow, or the sling weapon group, an attack you make against that enemy deals extra damage if the attack hits. You decide whether to apply the extra damage after making the damage roll. As you advance in level, your extra damage increases.

Level             |  Sneak Attack Damage
----------  |  -------------------
1st-10th       |  +2d6
11st-20th     |  +3d6
21st-30th     |  +5d6

fields.name: Ardent Mantle
fields.description:
A person's state of mind can be armor against the
decay and madness born from base emotions, and
thus ardents gird themselves by donning particular
mindsets to ward off the perils brought on by fear,
despair, and hatred. Various emotional states, called
mantles, can safeguard the mind. Ardents most commonly use the mantles of clarity and elation.

Choose one of the following options. Your choice
gives a power to you as well as a benefit to you and
your allies.

**Mantle of Clarity:** You and each ally within 5
squares of you gain a bonus to all defenses against
opportunity attacks. The bonus equals your Wisdom
modifier.

In addition, each ally within 5 squares of you gains
a +2 bonus to Insight checks and Perception checks.
You also gain the _ardent alacrity_ power.

**Mantle of Elation:** You and each ally within 5
squares of you gain a bonus to damage rolls for opportunity attacks. The bonus equals your Constitution
modifier.

In addition, each ally within 5 squares of you gains
a +2 bonus to Diplomacy checks and Intimidate
checks.

You also gain the _ardent outrage_ power.

fields.name: Ardent Surge
fields.description:
You gain the ardent surge power. Your advanced emotional state is inspirational, motivating your allies and
helping them to recover from injuries.

fields.name: Psionic Augmentation
fields.description:
Through discipline and careful study, you have mastered a form of psionic magic that offers greater
versatility than other characters command. You know
a broad array of at-will powers, each of which is a conduit through which you can pour as much or as little
psionic energy as you choose. You channel psionic
energy into a reservoir of personal power -- represented in the game as power points -- that you can use
to augment your at-will attack powers, replacing the
encounter attack powers that other characters use.

Because of this class feature, you acquire and use
powers in a slightly different manner from how most
other classes do.

**At-Will Attack Powers:** At 1st level, you choose
two at-will attack powers and one daily attack power
from your class, but you don't start with any encounter attack powers from your class. You can instead
augment your class at-will attack powers using power
points. These powers have the augmentable keyword.

You gain new at-will attack powers from this
class, instead of new encounter attack powers, as you
increase in level. At 3rd level, you choose a new at-will attack power from this class. At 7th, 13th, 17th,
23rd, and 27th level, you can replace one of your at-will attack powers with another one of your level or
lower. Both powers must be augmentable and from this class.

**Power Points:** You start with 2 power points.
You gain 2 additional power points at 3rd and 7th
level, 1 additional power point at 13th level, and 2
additional power points at 17th, 21st, 23rd, and 27th
level. Ifyou gain power points from another source
(such as your paragon path), add them to your power
point total. You can use your power pOints to augment
any augmentable power you have, regardless of how
you gained the power.

You regain all your power points when you take a
short or an extended rest.

fields.name: Draconic Power
fields.description: You gain a bonus to the damage rolls of arcane powers equal to your Strength modi- fier. The bonus increases to your Strength modifier + 2 at 11th level and your Strength modifier + 4 at 21st level.

fields.name: Draconic Resilience
fields.description: While you are not wearing heavy armor, you can use your Strength modifier in place of your Dexterity or Intelligence modifier to determine your AC.

fields.name: Dragon Soul
fields.description:
Choose a damage type: acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison, or thunder. You gain resist 5 to that damage type. The resistance increases to 10 at 11th level and 15 at 21st level.

Your arcane powers ignore any target’s resistance to that damage type up to the value of your resistance.

fields.name: Scales of the Dragon
fields.description: The first time you become bloodied during an encounter, you gain a +2 bonus to AC until the end of the encounter.

fields.name: Chaos Burst
fields.description: Your first attack roll during each of your turns determines a benefit you gain in that round. If you roll an even number, you gain a +1 bonus to AC until the start of your next turn. If you roll an odd number, you make a saving throw.

fields.name: Chaos Power
fields.description: You gain a bonus to the damage rolls of arcane powers equal to your Dexterity modi- fier. The bonus increases to your Dexterity modifier + 2 at 11th level and your Dexterity modifier + 4 at 21st level.

fields.name: Unfettered Power
fields.description:
When you roll a natural 20 on an attack roll for an arcane power, you slide the target 1 square and knock it prone after applying the attack’s other effects.

When you roll a natural 1 on an attack roll for an arcane power, you must push each creature within 5 squares of you 1 square.

fields.name: Wild Soul
fields.description:
When you finish an extended rest, roll a d10 to determine a damage type.

d10   |  DamageType
----  |  -----------
     1  |  Acid
     2  |  Cold
     3  |  Fire
     4  |  Force
     5  |  Lightning
     6  |  Necrotic
     7  |  Poison
     8  |  Psychic
     9  |  Radiant
   10  |  Thunder

You gain resist 5 to that damage type until the end of your next extended rest. The resistance increases to 10 at 11th level and 15 at 21st level.

While you have resistance to that damage type, your arcane powers ignore any target’s resistance to that damage type up to the value of your resistance.

fields.name: Psionic Augmentation
fields.description:
Through discipline and careful study, you have mastered a form of psionic magic that offers greater versatility than other characters command. You know a broad array ofat-will powers,each ofwhich is a con­ duit through which you can pour as much or as little psionic energy as you choose. You channel psionic energy into a reservoir of personal power-repre­ sented in the game as power points-that you can use to augment your at-will attack powers, replacing the encounter attack powers that other characters use.

Because ofthis class feature,you acquire and use powers in a slightly different manner from how most other classes do.

**At-Will Attack Powers:** At 1st level, you choose two at-will attack powers and one daily attack power from your class, but you don't start with any encoun­ ter attack powers from your class. You can instead augment your class at-will attack powers using power points. These powers have the augmentable keyword.
You gain new at-will attack powers from this class, instead of new encounter attack powers, as you increase in level. At 3rd level, you choose a new at­ will attack power from this class. At 7th, 13th, 17th, 23rd, and 27th level, you can replace one ofyour at· will attack powers with another one ofyour level or lower. Both powers must be augmentable and from this class.

**Power Points:** You start with 2 power points.  You gain 2 additional power points at 3rd and 7th level, 1 additional power point at 13th level, and 2 additional power points at 17th. 21st, 23rd, and 27th level. Ifyou gain power points from another source (such as your paragon path), add them to your power point total. You can use your power points to augment any augmentable power you have, regardless of how you gained the power.

You regain all your power points when you take a short or an extended rest.

fields.name: Psionic Defense
fields.description: Three powers-*battlemind's demand*, *blurred step*, and *mind spike*-help you maintain tactical superiority in combat. You can use these psionic powers to demand your enemies' attention, follow them if they try to avoid you, and punish them if they attack your allies. This combination of mental compulsion and psionic enhancement of your own capabilities makes you a force to be reckoned with in battle.

fields.name: Psionic Study
fields.description:
Battleminds learn to fight using their bodies as weapons. Some battleminds alter their own form to fit their needs. Other battleminds use their psionic power to predict the best position for launching an attack.

Choose one of these options.

**Battle Resilience:** You gain the *battle resilience power*, which reflects your ability to use your psionic power to bend your own body to protect yourself.

**Speed ofThought:** You gain the *speed of thought* power, which allows you to be always ready for a fight.

fields.name: Channel Divinity
fields.description:
Once per encounter you can invoke divine power, fill- ing yourself with the might of your patron deity. With the divine might you invoke you can wield special powers, such as divine mettle and divine strength. Some paladins learn other uses for this feature; for instance, the divinity feats in Chapter 6 grant characters with access to the Channel Divinity class feature the ability to use additional special powers.

Regardless of how many different uses for Channel Divinity you know, you can use only one such ability per encounter. The special ability or power you invoke works just like your other powers.

fields.name: Divine Challenge
fields.description: The challenge of a paladin is filled with divine menace. You can use the divine challenge power to mark an enemy of your choice.

fields.name: Lay on Hands
fields.description: Using the _lay on hands_ power, paladins can grant their comrades additional resilience with a touch of their hands and a short prayer, though they must give of their own strength to do so.

fields.name: Fighting Style
fields.description:
Choose one of the following fighting styles and gain its benefit.

**Archer Fighting Style**: Because of your focus on ranged attacks, you gain Defensive Mobility as a bonus feat.

**Two-Blade Fighting Style**: Because of your focus on two-weapon melee attacks, you can wield a one-handed weapon in your off hand as if it were an off-hand weapon. (Make sure to designate on your character sheet which weapon is main and which is off-hand.) In addition, you gain Toughness as a bonus feat.

fields.name: Hunter’s Quarry
fields.description:
Once per turn as a minor action, you can designate the enemy nearest to you as your quarry.

Once per round, you deal extra damage to your quarry. The extra damage is based on your level. If you can make multiple attacks in a round, you decide which attack to apply the extra damage to after all the attacks are rolled.
The hunter’s quarry effect remains active until the end of the encounter, until the quarry is defeated, or until you designate a different target as your quarry.

You can designate one enemy as your quarry at a time.

Level             |  Hunter’s Quarry Extra Damage
----------  |  -------------------
1st-10th       |  +2d6
11st-20th     |  +3d6
21st-30th     |  +5d6

fields.name: Prime Shot
fields.description: If none of your allies are nearer to your target than you are, you receive a +1 bonus to ranged attack rolls against that target.

fields.name: Eldritch Blast
fields.description: All warlocks know the eldritch blast at-will power. This power can be used as a basic attack. You gain this power as well as another at-will power as determined by your Eldritch Pact.

fields.name: Fey Pact
fields.description:
You have forged a bargain with ancient, amoral powers of the Feywild. Some are primitive earth spir- its, grim and menacing; some are capricious wood, sky, or water spirits; and others are incarnations of seasons or natural forces who roam the faerie realm like wild gods. They bestow magic that ranges from feral and savage to wondrous and enchanting.

**Eyebite**: You know the eyebite at-will spell.

**Misty Step**: You have the Misty Step pact boon. You instantly transform into silver mist that streams a short distance and reforms, allowing you to flee or maneuver to set up a deadly attack.

When an enemy under your Warlock’s Curse is reduced to 0 hit points or fewer, you can immediately teleport 3 squares as a free action.

fields.name: Infernal Pact
fields.description:
Long ago a forgotten race of devils created a secret path to power and taught it to the tieflings of old to weaken their fealty to Asmodeus. In his wrath, Asmo- deus destroyed the scheming devils and struck their very names from the memory of all beings—but you dare to study their perilous secrets anyway.

**Hellish Rebuke**: You know the hellish rebuke at-will spell.

**Dark One’s Blessing: You have the Dark One’s Level Blessing pact boon. You instantly gain vitality from a cursed enemy when that enemy falls. When an enemy under your Warlock’s Curse is reduced to 0 hit points or fewer, you immediately gain ￼￼￼temporary hit points equal to your level.

fields.name: Star Pact
fields.description:
You have mastered the astrologer’s art, learning the secret names of the stars and gazing into the Far Realm beyond, gaining great power thereby. You can call upon powers that madden or terrify your enemies, manipulate chance and fate, or scour your foes with icy banes and curses drawn from beyond the night sky.

**Dire Radiance**: You know the dire radiance at-will spell.

**Fate of the Void**: You have the Fate of the Void pact boon. Your curse intermingles with the lost vital- ity of a cursed enemy to reveal a glimpse of the future to you.

When an enemy under your Warlock’s Curse is reduced to 0 hit points or fewer, you gain a +1 bonus to any single d20 roll you make during your next turn (attack roll, saving throw, skill check, or ability check). If you don’t use this bonus by the end of your turn, it is lost.

This bonus is cumulative; if three cursed enemies drop to 0 hit points or fewer before your next turn, you gain a +3 bonus to a d20 roll during your turn.

fields.name: Prime Shot
fields.description: If none of your allies are nearer to your target than you are, you receive a +1 bonus to ranged attack rolls against that target.

fields.name: Shadow Walk
fields.description: On your turn, if you move at least 3 squares away from where you started your turn, you gain concealment until the end of your next turn.

fields.name: Warlock’s Curse
fields.description:
Once per turn as a minor action, you can place a Warlock’s Curse on the enemy nearest to you that you can see. A cursed enemy is more vulnerable to your attacks. If you damage a cursed enemy, you deal extra damage. You decide whether to apply the extra damage after making the damage roll. You can deal this extra damage once per round.
